title: The Complete Timeline of Prince William and Kate Middleton‚Äôs Relationship
text:
Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.
The last few years have seen a lot of enormous changes in the British Royal Family, an entity known more for tradition than rapid growth. After the loss of Queen Elizabeth II, who ruled over the U.K. most of the 21st century, some people may be looking for some stability. If there's any couple in the family who offers that, it's Prince William and Kate Middleton.
William and Kate have had what appears on the outside to be a bit of a fairytale romance, from the storybook wedding to the picturesque family of five they have now. Sure, the full details of that fairytale aren't known, and some of what's been shown may be in part to help the royal family's image. But optics aside, there‚Äôs something about them that has captivated people since the beginning of their relationship. Here‚Äôs a look back at their journey, from college sweethearts to royal power couple.
Prince William and Kate Middleton meet while both studying at St. Andrews University in Scotland. Rumor has it that William was won over after seeing Kate modeling at a student fashion show for charity (a show for which he reportedly paid ¬£200 for a front row seat).
Other rumors suggest that her reason for being at St. Andrews was entirely related to meeting her future husband.
The Crown historian Robert Lacey wrote in his 2020 book Battle of Brothers: William and Harry‚ÄîThe Inside Story of a Family in Tumult, that Kate was trying to manifest her future relationship with William when she was only 19.
‚ÄúKate was very strategic,‚Äù Lacey said. ‚ÄúShe gave up her place at one of Britain‚Äôs premier universities, Edinburgh, and opted for another one [St. Andrews] that probably didn‚Äôt have the same academic standard. She had already been to Edinburgh to get her flat accommodations sorted out but switched universities and switched her courses to history of art because that was William‚Äôs. She delayed her own education by a year and even takes the chance she won‚Äôt get into St. Andrews.‚Äù
She was not the only person making these choices. Applications to the school reportedly went up by 44% after it was announced that was William's choice of university. They might not all have been marriage hopefuls, but some probably were like Kate.
Hello! magazine reported that Prince William was moving from his dorm into a flat with three college friends, one of them ‚Äúa pretty 20-year-old brunette‚Äù who, as you might guess, turned out to be Kate Middleton.
He allegedly started out as just her friend, before seeing her walk in a fashion show in this see-through dress on March 26, 2002.
‚ÄúShe‚Äôs there and about to walk down the runway on the fashion show, and she strips off an extra layer of clothing,‚Äù Lacey explained. ‚ÄúHere is a very strategic lady who knows what she wants and has got it.‚Äù
They began dating soon after.
William and Kate are photographed together for the first time during a ski trip in Klosters, causing then-Prince Charles to threaten to sever ties with The Sun, the outlet that published the photos. Charles was said to have been ‚Äúvery disappointed‚Äù by the breach in an agreement between the press and Buckingham Palace that ensures royal children can continue their education without having their privacy intruded upon.
Both William and Kate graduate from St. Andrews. The Middletons later share a photo of them together on the day.
The couple attend Camilla's daughter Laura Parker-Bowles‚Äô wedding, marking one of their first big public appearances together, and sparking speculation that they were serious enough to one day walk down the aisle together themselves.
In 2007, William and Kate took a time-out and broke up for a couple months. Kate took a vacation to Ireland with her friends afterwards, while William awkwardly fielded questions about ‚Äúhow things are going‚Äù with Kate.
Kate later said in 2010 during an interview after their engagement that in hindsight, she thinks it was healthy for them to have time apart.
‚ÄúI think I at the time wasn't very happy about it, but actually it made me a stronger person...You find out things about yourself that maybe you hadn't realized,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúOr I think you can get quite consumed by a relationship when you're younger. I really valued that time for me as well although I didn't think it at the time, looking back on it."
By July of that same year, rumors began to swirl about a possible reconciliation as Kate is seen attending a Princess Diana tribute concert‚Äîthough she sat two rows behind William with her sister Pippa.
The two are seen together again, back where it all began: the ski slopes. Photos show Kate and William together in Klosters as sources told newspapers that they were very much back together.
William graduates from his RAF training, with Kate at his side.
William proposes to Kate while on a trip to Kenya, with Princess Diana‚Äôs sapphire engagement ring. ‚ÄúWe had a little private time away together with some friends, and I just decided it was the right time really,‚Äù William later said in their engagement interview. ‚ÄúWe'd been talking about marriage or a while, so it wasn't a massively big surprise, but I took her up somewhere nice in Kenya.‚Äù
Prince William and Kate Middleton get married in a fairytale ceremony at Westminster Abbey witnessed by nearly 72 million people worldwide. The bride did her own makeup, the groom wore sweat pads so that he wouldn‚Äôt sweat out of his uniform, and Ellie Goulding performed at the reception.
In marrying William, Kate gained the title Duchess of Cambridge, the Countess of Strathearn, and Lady Carrickfergus.
After the wedding, the married couple settle in Wales and adopt a dog, an English Cocker Spaniel named Lupo.
St. James‚Äô Palace announces that Kate is pregnant with the couple‚Äôs first child. During her pregnancy, she‚Äôs hospitalized for hyperemesis gravidarum, or severe morning sickness.
Kate gives birth to Prince George, and steps out for post-baby photos.
Kensington Palace announces that Kate is pregnant with their second child. Kate had not reached the 12-week stage, but the Palace made the announcement because they felt they couldn‚Äôt keep the pregnancy under wraps from the press for much longer. Once again, Kate suffers from extreme morning sickness.
Kate gives birth to Princess Charlotte, who becomes fourth in line for the throne after Prince Charles, her father Prince William, and her older brother Prince George. She‚Äôs also the first to take up the title of Princess in 25 years, and is the highest ranking female in line for the throne.
The coupled made their red carpet debut at the British Academy Film Awards, where Prince William presented a BAFTA Fellowship award to Mel Brooks. Kate wore an off-the-shoulder tiered Alexander McQueen gown in a floral print.
Kensington Palace announces that Kate is pregnant with the couple‚Äôs third child. As with her previous two pregnancies, she suffers from hyperemesis gravidarum.
Kate gives birth to Prince Louis, who is now fifth in line for the throne. Though tradition dictated that Louis, as a male, would overtake Princess Charlotte for a place on the throne, the policy was amended prior to George's birth with the Succession to the Crown Act 2013. That made Charlotte the first female royal to trump a younger male sibling.
Kate and Prince were front and center at the marriage of his little brother, Prince Harry, to Meghan Markle.
The couple helped Harry and Meghan celebrate on their wedding day at their nuptials at St. George's Chapel in Windsor, England. ‚ÄúWilliam was in a jokey, wonderful mood at the party,‚Äù a wedding guest told People at the time, adding that Kate was also in ‚Äúgreat form.‚Äù
They added, ‚ÄúShe and William were saying how thrilled they were to have their children there taking part.‚Äù
At Princess Eugenie's wedding, Kate and William are seen showing each other a little affection. Eugenie was marrying her husband Jack Brooksbank when the royal couple were seen holding hands in the pew.
#RoyalWedding Aaahhh! My heart! üíïüíûüíëüòçüòçüòçüòç #DukeandDuchessofCambridge pic.twitter.com/Xup5ouu67a
Kate and William tend to be hands off when out in public.
After lockdown began in the U.K., the couple spoke with the BBC in a rare joint interview, discussing what it's like to parent through a pandemic.
‚ÄúIt's been ups and downs, like a lot of families self-isolating,‚Äù Kate said. ‚ÄúThe children have got such stamina, I don't know how. Honestly, you get to the end of the day and you write down the list of all the things that you've done in that day. So, you pitch a tent, take the tent down again, cook, bake. You get to the end of the day‚Äîthey have had a lovely time‚Äîbut it is amazing how much you can cram into one day, that's for sure.‚Äù
Nine years after welcoming their cocker spaniel, Ludo, into their lives, the couple announced they had bid him farewell. They shared a handsome portrait of the dog on Instagram with a heartfelt goodbye.
‚ÄúVery sadly last weekend our dear dog, Lupo, passed away,‚Äù the post read. ‚ÄúHe has been at the heart of our family for the past nine years and we will miss him so much. - W & C.‚Äù
April of 2021 was the 10-year anniversary of the couple's marriage, otherwise known as the tin anniversary. To celebrate, they shared some new portraits by Chris Floyd at Kensington Palace.
They also posted a video of themselves with their children walking through the sand dunes in Norfolk, England, thanking everyone for the well wishes on the occasion of their anniversary.
Queen Elizabeth appoints Kate Middleton as a sponsor of the naval battleship HMS Glasglow. The office requires Kate to maintain a ‚Äústrong and enduring personal connection to the vessel and her crew, often supporting milestones, events and deployments.‚Äù
‚ÄúHer Majesty the Queen has approved the appointment of my wife Catherine as Sponsor of the superb ship we see taking shape outside‚ÄîHMS Glasgow,‚Äù Prince William said in the announcement. ‚ÄúI know that Catherine will be delighted to join you here in Glasgow for the naming ceremony in due course.‚Äù 
The couple got all dressed up for the No Time to Die premiere in London, posing with Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles. The royal family members were guests of honor at the event. 
Kate wore a Jenny Packham capelet gown covered in gold sequins. 
Kate and William enjoyed their first Earthshot Awards, at Alexandra Palace in London. The environmental initiative was launched by William, and he was tasked with giving a speech at the ceremony. A photo shows them sharing a sweet moment together behind-the-scenes.
Also at the event was Emma Thompson, Emma Watson, David Oyelowo, and Mo Salah. Ed Sheeran, Shawn Mendes, KSI, and Coldplay performed.
Enjoying another fun premiere, the coupled hit the red carpet for Top Gun in the U.K. 
Kate wore a black Roland Mouret gown, with an off-the-shoulders, white wraparound detail. 
The couple's first official portrait was unveiled at the University of Cambridge's Fitzwilliam Museum. Originally commissioned in 2021 by the Cambridgeshire Royal Portrait Fund, it was painted by Jamie Coreth. Coreth is an award-winning portrait artist.
The Duke and Duchess take their three children to visit the Lambrook school, where they will be newly attending. The preview day offered the family a chance to get to know the facilities and teachers.
Prince George, Princess Charlotte, and Prince Louis were all wearing their school uniforms. 
Queen Elizabeth II dies on September 8, sending the family into mourning. There is also a great deal of change in terms of titles and responsibilities. The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge became the Duke and Duchess of Cornwall and of Rothesay, and on September 9, his father conferred the title of Prince and Princess of Wales. 
In his address to the nation following the immediate news of his mother's death, King Charles III said, ‚ÄúWith Catherine beside him, our new Prince and Princess of Wales will, I know, continue to inspire and lead our national conversations, helping to bring the marginal to the centre ground where vital help can be given.‚Äù
The Princess of Wales was a title once held by William's mother, Princess Diana. 
Along with Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, William and Kate visit Windsor Castle to view flowers and gifts left by citizens to honor the late Queen.
The couple attends Queen Elizabeth's funeral at Westminster Hall after escorting her coffin from Buckingham Palace.
They post their farewells to her on Twitter with a photo of the procession.
Goodbye to a Queen, a mother, a grandmother and a great grandmother. pic.twitter.com/hKEI9RcAOp
Kate and William attended the Festival of Remembrance, a ceremony dedicated to the day the Allies and Germany signed the armistice that ended World War 1 in 1918 for Europe.
At the commemorative concert at the Royal Albert Hall later that evening, Kate paid tribute to the late Queen by wearing some of her famous jewelry: her Japanese pearl choker necklace along with her Bahrain diamond and pearl drop earrings.
The Princess of Wales shared her Together at Christmas carol service on ITV after filming it at Westminster Abbey, for the second year in a row. The event was dedicated to Queen Elizabeth's memory and attended by William, George, and Charlotte.
Harry and Meghan's docuseries is released on Netflix, and it was reported that Kate and William refused to watch it.
Vanity Fair wrote, ‚ÄúWhile aides will be watching the series closely, along with the royals‚Äô lawyers, the palace are reluctant to comment on the show because they don‚Äôt want to feed what has become a media frenzy.‚Äù
Another source told Page Six that William and Kate haven't watched the series.
‚ÄúWilliam and Kate‚Äôs aides have briefed them on the show, but don‚Äôt expect the couple to sit down in their cottage with a bowl of popcorn to tune in themselves,‚Äù the insider said.
Later in the month, they must have acquired more details, because a source told Us Weekly on December 22 that Kate felt ‚Äúbetrayed‚Äù by the situation.
‚ÄúKate feels hurt and betrayed that Harry would do this to her, too, especially as the pair used to be so close,‚Äù they said.
As for William he ‚Äúisn‚Äôt planning to give his side of the story or openly retaliate.‚Äù
After the docuseries, Kate and William were hit with another wave of bad publicity when Harry's memoir Spare was officially released, making things even icier between the two couples. A source who knows both couples told Entertainment Tonight in a report published January 12 that ‚Äú[their] relationship has completely broken down.‚Äù
A separate source said Kate felt ‚Äúhurt and disappointed‚Äù over what Harry shared about her in Spare because she believed ‚Äúprivate matters had been made public.‚Äù  
Kate and William marked British Mother's Day on their Instagram, sharing new photos of Kate with the couple's three children. ‚ÄúHappy Mother‚Äôs Day from our family to yours ‚ù§Ô∏è,‚Äù the couple wrote.
The royal couple celebrated their 12 year anniversary with an adorable photo on Instagram in which they're sitting on matching bikes and the prince has his arm around the shoulder of his princess. They're both dressed casually in jeans, and Kate is wearing a lacy white button down while William is in navy blue.
‚Äú12 years ‚ù§Ô∏è,‚Äù they captioned the photo.
A source spoke to Us Weekly about how Kate and William‚Äôs relationship is going, saying ‚Äúmore than anything, they‚Äôre proud of their marriage and beautiful family.‚Äù
‚ÄúWilliam and Kate are more in sync than ever,‚Äù a palace insider told the outlet. ‚ÄúThey cherish what they have with each other. For them, family comes first, and it always will.‚Äù
The source said the challenges the couple has faced in the last year, including the death of Queen Elizabeth II, have strengthened their relationship. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre in awe of each other,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúWilliam tells anyone who will listen that he couldn‚Äôt do it without Kate, and she echoes that right back.‚Äù
They‚Äôve also become slightly more comfortable showing PDA, although they are still very reserved in public: ‚ÄúWilliam used to be quite awkward about showing too much affection, but Kate‚Äôs helped him relax.‚Äù
A source told Us Weekly that Kate and William‚Äôs marriage isn‚Äôt complete smooth sailing. ‚ÄúKate and William have been having ups and downs in their marriage like everyone else,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúBut they‚Äôre focused on their royal duties and doing that as a unit.‚Äù
Aim√©e Lutkin is the weekend editor at ELLE.com. Her writing has appeared in Jezebel, Glamour, Marie Claire and more. Her first book, The Lonely Hunter, will be released by Dial Press in February 2022.

title: All About Chris Evans‚Äô Wife Alba Baptista
text:
On November 10, People's newest Sexiest Man Alive Chris Evans revealed that he has been dating 26-year-old actress Alba Baptista for at least a year and ‚Äúit's serious,‚Äù according to a source, who added,‚ÄúThey are in love, and Chris has never been happier. His family and friends all adore her.‚Äù
In January 2023, a source reiterated that to Us Weekly, describing them as having ‚Äúgotten serious.‚Äù On Valentine's Day 2023, Evans himself shared a very public look inside their private relationship. He posted a video of photos from time together to honor his girlfriend.
Happy Valentine‚Äôs Day! ‚ù§Ô∏èChris Evans via Instagram Stories ‚ú® pic.twitter.com/kixfEDiZWv
And in September 2023, the couple quietly got married, People reported.
Here, everything to know about Baptista and their relationship timeline so far.
The actress is best known for her role on Netflix's Warrior Nun, her English-language debut. 
Baptista is from Portugal and was born in Lisbon. She has starred in several popular Portuguese films and TV shows, including A Impostora, Filha da Lei, A Cria√ß√£o, and Jogo Duplo. After Warrior Nun, she starred in the 2022 dramatic comedy, Mrs. Harris Goes to Paris.
Outside of acting, she has a passion for charity work and in 2018, worked at an orphanage in Cambodia focusing on education. She also speaks five languages, including Spanish, French, German, English, and her native Portuguese.
The almost a year estimate is partially based on some fan detective work. ‚ÄúThat's absolutely something I want: wife, kids, building a family,‚Äù Evans said. ‚ÄúWhen you read about most of the best artists, whether it's actors, painters, writers, most of them [admit] it wasn't the work they made [that they are most proud of], it was about the relationships; the families they created, the love they found, the love they shared.‚Äù
He continued, ‚ÄúSo it's also something through my long 41 years that also rings true. Those things are the most important. I love the idea of tradition and ceremony. I had a lot of that in my life, so the idea of creating that‚ÄîI can't think of anything better.‚Äù
Later in January 2023, a source told Us Weekly that he and Baptista were very serious as a couple. ‚ÄúChris and Alba have gotten serious,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúThis is the most committed anyone can remember him being in a very long time, if not ever.‚Äù 
‚ÄúThey spend most of their time at his place in Massachusetts and love the quiet life there, surrounded by nature and away from the spotlight,‚Äù the source added. ‚ÄúChris was very open that he wanted to take his time before settling down.‚Äù
People reported that Evans and Baptista got married at a private estate in Cape Cod over the weekend of September 9 and 10, 2023. Evans‚Äô Marvel co-stars were seen at the ceremony, including  Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, in addition to actors John Krasinski and Emily Blunt. Allegedly yes, per Page Six. Then they‚Äôll depart from Portugal for their honeymoon.‚Äù
A source spoke to People on September 11 about how Evans knew quickly after meeting Baptista in Europe that she was the woman with whom he wanted to build a life.

It's the best news that they are married.‚Äù

title: All About Ethan Slater, Ariana Grande‚Äôs New Boyfriend and Wicked Co-Star
text:
Just days after Ariana Grande's separation from her husband of two years, Dalton Gomez, was widely reported, news broke that Grande found love again...on the set of Wicked.
Grande and her co-star Ethan Slater, who is also separated from his wife, started dating recently, as People, Entertainment Tonight, and TMZ reported on July 20, 2023. Slater and Grande's commonalities go beyond their work in Wicked, though: Both are Broadway alumni (Grande for her work in 13: The Musical, Slater for his in the Spongebob musical).
Here's what to know about Slater and his history with Grande.
Slater is a Gemini and celebrated his 31st birthday on June 2; he grew up in Washington, D.C. and attended Vassar College. His most high-profile role so far was starring as Spongebob in Broadway's SpongeBob SquarePants: The Musical. It was a project he was involved in for years, starting when he was just 19.
‚ÄúWorking on SpongeBob changed the way that I approach everything because I started working on it when I was 19, and it was seven years of development‚Äîfrom starting development until closing on Broadway,‚Äù he told Pop-Culturalist.com in August 2021. So it was like my full education, which is awesome. We approached it from this perspective, which came from [director] Tina [Landau], that this isn‚Äôt a show that is talking down to kids. This is a show that is funny; it‚Äôs funny, it‚Äôs visually stimulating, it‚Äôs physical humor. Kids like it because it taps into this optimism and heart; and adults like it because it taps into things they remember from their childhood. But it‚Äôs not a show that is solely designed for kids. It was meant to make us laugh while we were making it.‚Äù
Boq notably has a big crush on Grande's character Glinda in Wicked. Slater and Grande have been shooting the film adaptation in the U.K. since December. Slater's casting in Wicked was announced in December 2022.
.@ethansaslater has joined the @wickedmovie as Boq! https://t.co/hkOCQBVZCb
Both Slater and Grande are newly single after being married. People reported that Slater and his wife Lilly Jay were separated after news of his dating Grande broke on July 20. Jay and Slater started dating in 2012 and got married in November 2018. They welcomed their first child, a son, in August 2022.
Slater celebrated Jay this Mother's Day on his Instagram account. He wrote, ‚ÄúHappy first Mother‚Äôs Day to the most loving caring and wonderful mom/person in the world. - from me and this little guy.‚Äù Grande had liked the post.
He also posted a tribute to her in November 2022, writing, ‚ÄúMy best friend. 4 years married, 10 years together. And this is easily the best (and most *bizarre*) year yet.‚Äù Grande liked that post too.
On Saturday, July 22, a source who knows Lilly told ET that the new mother is ‚Äúdevastated‚Äù and that ‚Äúthis is not the future she had in mind.‚Äù
They added, ‚ÄúShe's doing her best to get back on her feet. She's incredibly smart and driven...she is truly the best mother.‚Äù
Slater had a public Instagram account when reports initially broke of his and Grande's dating. But shortly after the news stories spread, Slater went private on his Instagram. He had already limited comments on some posts beforehand.
After filing for divorce from his wife Lilly Jay in late July and spending a month laying low, Slater returned to Instagram at the beginning of September to promote his role in Spamalot on Broadway.
Grande liked the image in a show of support that got media attention.
A source told People, ‚ÄúAriana and Dalton separated in January. She and Ethan recently began dating, and he is separated from his wife.‚Äù
Us Weekly received similar intel from its source: ‚ÄúAriana and Ethan are dating; however things are fairly new. Ariana and Dalton split in January, and Ethan is separated from his wife. Ariana and Ethan have only recently begun seeing each other but they have a lot of fun together and are enjoying each other‚Äôs company.‚Äù
Entertainment Tonight's source also stressed that this is very recent: ‚ÄúAriana and Ethan recently started dating. They have a lot in common and have a lot of fun,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúThey didn't start dating until both were broken up with their significant others. Ariana and Dalton remain friends.‚Äù
TMZ, meanwhile, reported that Slater and Grande had been dating ‚Äúseveral months ago during production‚Äù of Wicked, per its multiple sources. The insiders stressed that Slater and Grande did not start dating until after they were separated from their spouses. They were photographed sitting next to each other while celebrating Wicked co-star Michelle Yeoh's Oscar win in March.
On July 28, a source emphasized to ET that Slater and Grande started as friends, saying, ‚ÄúAriana and Dalton both realized they were very different people and quietly separated earlier this year. Ariana and Ethan connected as friends first because they have a lot in common and many similar interests.‚Äù 
‚ÄúWhile this entire situation has been blown out of proportion, it‚Äôs much different than what has been portrayed in public,‚Äù a friend close to the couple told People. ‚ÄúThey are just trying to navigate their new relationship in private.‚Äù
Another source added, ‚ÄúThey are doing their best to balance the fact that they are in the public eye with the desire to be respectful to all parties involved.‚Äù
A source alleged to the Daily Mail in September 2023 that things had escalated between Grande and Slater, and they were living together in New York City as Slater prepares for his Spamalot role on Broadway. Neither Grande nor Slater confirmed the rumor.
On October 4, a source told Us Weekly the same. They said, ‚ÄúEthan informed his friends and soon-to-be ex-wife [Lilly Jay] that he‚Äôs living with Ariana full-time in New York. They‚Äôre really happy and really good for each other. All of her friends love him.‚Äù
In an August 2021 interview with Pop-Culturalist.com, Slater discussed how he co-wrote the musical Edge of the World based on that loss. ‚ÄúOne of the big things is the mining [of] my personal experience for writing,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWhen I was 7 years old, my mom died, and so that‚Äôs been a really big, formative thing in my life. She had left this huge imprint on me, even though I had so few memories. And that‚Äôs what happens to this character, Ben. He grows up not knowing his mom, being raised by a single dad, and yet the impact she has on his life and his life trajectory is immeasurable. So those are the two inspirational elements that came together.‚Äù

title: All About Dylan Meyer, Kristen Stewart‚Äôs Screenwriter Fianc√©e
text:
As Kristen Stewart and Dylan Meyer‚Äôs relationship continues way past the two-year mark, things between them are stronger than ever‚Äîto the point where they‚Äôre ready to get married. On November 2, 2021, Stewart revealed the two are engaged to Howard Stern, and Meyer popped the question.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre marrying, we‚Äôre totally gonna do it,‚Äù Stewart said. ‚ÄúI wanted to be proposed to, so I think I very distinctly carved out what I wanted and she nailed it. We‚Äôre marrying, it‚Äôs happening.‚Äù
It‚Äôs a decidedly new chapter for Stewart, who opened up in a recent issue of InStyle about being ‚Äúsort of cagey‚Äù in previous relationships. Meyer and Stewart were first romantically linked in summer 2019, but the couple actually met six years before on a movie set, Stewart told Howard Stern last November. They later reconnected at a birthday party for a mutual friend. ‚ÄúThe day that I met her, all bets were off,‚Äù Stewart remembered. ‚ÄúI was like, ‚ÄòWhere have I been and how have I not known you?‚Äô She's been, like, living in LA alongside my life somehow but not ever converging?‚Äù
The actress even told the radio host that she was ready to propose in November 2019, two years before it actually happened. 
In July 2021, the two even sparked secret marriage rumors when they were photographed wearing rings on their left ring fingers, although they never even announced they were engaged. In September 2021, the two were photographed together again, signaling their relationship remains on and strong.
Ahead, everything we know about Meyer, including her screenwriting career and how she paid tribute to Stewart during her birthday and Valentine's Day in 2023.
Stewart told Stern that she met Meyer on a movie set six years ago. While she didn't specify which one, Meyer has written and co-starred in multiple films and TV shows. She co-wrote and executive produced the 2016 Netflix movie XOXO, starring Sarah Hyland. She penned episodes of the sci-fi series Miss 2059. Meyer also wrote the short films Loose Ends (2015) and Rock Bottom (2019), which you can watch right here:
As for her acting credits, Meyer has appeared in short films including The Death and Return of Superman (2011), Wrestling Isn't Wrestling (2015), and Jem Reacts to the New Jem and the Holograms Trailer (2015). 
Rumors about Meyer and Stewart's relationship began in August 2019 when the pair was seen kissing on a New York City stoop. The sighting came less than a month after Stewart was photographed kissing on-off girlfriend Stella Maxwell on a yacht in Italy. A source told E! at the time that while "it will always be very easy for Kristen to fall back with Stella," she's focused on her new relationship with Meyer. 
"Kristen is spending time with Dylan and very happy about it," the insider told E! News. "She was seeing Stella for a little bit while it worked, but now she has moved on with Dylan." The source added, "Kristen isn't holding back at all and loves being with her. They are moving quickly and always together."
Stewart confirmed the fast-paced nature of their romance during her November interview with Stern, revealing to him that she told Meyer she loved her two weeks into dating. "It was like really late, and we were in some shitty bar, and her friends were there or whatever, and they like walked out, and I was just like, 'Oh man, I‚Äôm so f*cking in love with you. Done,'" she recalled. "It wasn't like a thing, and also it was like so obvious. It just is." Stewart later added of their connection,  "We're both from L.A. and we really love L.A. We're both kind of like, scumbags. We both felt like trolls as kids. We're so similar but different. She's a writer; she's brilliant."
Although Stewart herself doesn't have a public Instagram, Meyer shared a first glimpse into the couple's relationship last October. She posted a black-and-white snap of a polaroid where the couple can be seen kissing. "Find me under the covers hiding from the happiness police. üñ§," she captioned the post.
Six months later, Meyer shared a birthday tribute for Stewart on the 'gram, writing, "It‚Äôs my absolute favorite person's birthday and I‚Äôm wishing everyone the volume of beautiful feeling I feel toward her. It's a short ride on this earth, spend your time with someone that inspires you to be the best version of yourself and lights your shit on fire."
When Meyer isn't gushing about Stewart, her social media is filled with a ton of nature and animal photos. You'll find pictures of her cats Zsa Zsa and Snack in various scenarios, as well as outdoor shots from around Los Angeles.
The couple may keep their romance private, but that doesn't mean things aren't serious between them. During her November 2019 interview with Stern, Stewart got very candid about her feelings toward Meyer. She told Stern that she "can't f*cking wait" to propose to Meyer and said she would "absolutely" get married. 
"Yeah, I want to be, like, somewhat reasonable about it, but I think good things happen fast," Stewart continued, telling Stern she has a plan for how she'll pop the question. "I can't say right now, because she'll find out." Stewart also said that her matrimony plans weren't "tied to any weird sort of convention; it's just, like, when you know, you know."
Meyer and Stewart kept a low-profile during stay-at-home orders but made made a rare outing in June 2020 for a coffee run in L.A. The Daily Mail captured photos of the couple wearing casual gray and black outfits, masks, and sunglasses while on their errand.  
The outlet also published photos of the couple participating in a Black Lives Matter protest in Los Angeles earlier this month, following the deaths of George Floyd, Breonna Taylor, Ahmaud Arbery, and others at the hands of police. 
Sources told  E! in October 2020 that Stewart and Meyer attended an intimate baby shower for Emma Roberts and Garrett Hedlund. (Stewart and Hedlund co-starred together in 2012's On the Road.) They joined the likes of Camilla Morrone (Leonardo DiCaprio's girlfriend) and Lily Kershaw to celebrate the upcoming arrival of Roberts and Hedlund's son.
Stewart, who next stars in the LGBTQ holiday rom-com Happiest Season, doesn‚Äôt have a ‚Äôgram. However, she used her girlfriend‚Äôs platform to urge people to vote in the upcoming election. ‚ÄúI turned the mic over to Kristen because she had some things to say and doesn‚Äôt have her own account. Happy #nationalvoterregistrationday!‚Äù Meyer captioned a selfie of Stewart in a ‚ÄúVOTE‚Äù tee on September 22. Kristen wrote, via Meyer's account:
Meyer also shared a black-and-white photo of herself and Stewart to encourage voting. ‚ÄúI think I might chew my fingers off from nerves today but here‚Äôs a sweet photo @lindseybyrnes took. I really hope you vote. There are lots of crucial issues on your ballot besides the presidency and your voice truly does make a difference. The opportunity to have a say in the laws that govern you is precious, please don‚Äôt waste it,‚Äù she captioned the snap.
On April 9, Stewart‚Äôs 31st birthday, she and Meyer were out grocery shopping (masked). 
She also posted on Instagram to celebrate her girlfriend‚Äôs birthday. 
‚ÄúLife sure is sweeter with this cute little family,‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúHappy birthday, kiddo. You knock my socks off.‚Äù
LaineyGossip pointed out that Stewart and Meyer were photographed at LAX in July 2021 wearing rings on their left ring finger. The two never confirmed wedding rumors or that Stewart even proposed to Meyer at this point. Meyer and Stewart, throughout their relationship, have managed to keep most details private and out of the limelight.
On November 2, Stewart told Howard Stern that Meyer popped the question.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre marrying, we‚Äôre totally gonna do it,‚Äù Stewart said. ‚ÄúI wanted to be proposed to, so I think I very distinctly carved out what I wanted and she nailed it. We‚Äôre marrying, it‚Äôs happening.‚Äù
During her appearance on Stephen Colbert's talk show, Stewart addressed wedding planning‚Äîand how they may just elope. ‚ÄúI want to have a big party or something,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so unceremonial. I think we might just go do it this weekend or something, I don't know, and then, like, just hang out with everyone afterwards,‚Äù Stewart said.
It isn‚Äôt often Stewart and Meyer's private life with friends is documented on social media, but Ashley Benson gave the world a rare glimpse into their dynamic in January 2022. The former Pretty Little Liars actress shared a group shot of Stewart and Meyer alongside each other and friends at Disneyland. ‚ÄúFamily trips to Disney @cjromero @spillzdylz @sweetsuzieq @michael,‚Äù Benson captioned the shot, tagging Meyer's Instagram.
Stewart is nominated for Best Actress at the Oscars this year, and ahead of the ceremony, Meyer joined Stewart on the events circuit. On March 8, Meyer attended the Oscars nominee luncheon with Stewart and The Hollywood Reporter‚Äôs Oscar nominees night. Meyer matched her outfits to Stewart‚Äôs for both events, wearing a black Alessandra Rich mini dress for the luncheon and a white tank in the evening.
The two then attended the Critics‚Äô Choice Awards together, where Stewart was nominated for Best Actress for her portrayal of Princess Diana in Spencer. At the show, Stewart wore a nude, glittery Dolce & Gabbana gown with Messika jewelry and Jimmy Choo shoes and Meyer wore a complimentary white August Getty Atelier and Chanel ensemble.
Stewart spoke this month about how blessed she feels having her personal life and career thrive at the same time. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm living a simulation, it‚Äôs too good,‚Äù Stewart told E!. ‚ÄúYou run through the list, and I go, like, is that possible? Right now, I‚Äôm definitely feeling it. It‚Äôs not lost on me any second of any day. I will tell you that.‚Äù
To top off an eventful awards season, Meyer and Stewart stepped out together at the 2022 Academy Awards, where Stewart is nominated for Best Actress for her role in Spencer. The duo, matching in black and white suits, posed together in the red carpet and engaged in some PDA in front of the cameras. They held hands as photos snapped and shared a quick kiss before Meyer let Stewart pose solo.

On Saturday, December 3, the pair were spotted tooling around Los Angeles in their Dodge van like any suburban couple. They were headed to a friend's house and dressed comfortably for the afternoon. Stewart was behind the wheel and smoking a cigarette as she navigated the quiet streets. The Twilight actress was wearing black Adidas sweatpants with white stripes and a black sports bra under a hoodie. She paired the look with white Nike sneakers and sunglasses. After being a blonde for quite a while, Stewart has gone brunette with a short chop. 
Meyer was also dressed casually and in sunglasses. Sunday, December 4, was Meyer's 35th birthday, so there may have been fancier plans ahead for the couple. 
While the pair have kept their relationship mostly under the radar, Meyer posted a tribute to Stewart on her Instagram on February 14, 2023. Meyer wrote: ‚ÄúOne time I turned a hundred dollars into fourteen hundred dollars at a casino in Pittsburgh. I was playing craps (my first time ever) and when it was my turn at the dice I didn‚Äôt roll a seven for forty five minutes straight. Strangers were getting rich off of my hot streak, tipping me chips and tequila shots. Cheering for me, clapping me on the back. Calling their gambling addicted friends/co-workers/ex-wives to regale them with my extraordinary feat. I was the hero of the people, an instant legend. Bennie and the Jets was playing. I love you more than a dominos pizza when you‚Äôre stoned, a Ricky‚Äôs fish taco when you‚Äôre hungover, and EVEN more than a plate of wings ~ hot and extra crispy ~ from rustic, aka the pinnacle of my capacity to love. Some might say that‚Äôs too much love but I say those people are squares. Go big or go home! Happy birthday dude I love you so much.‚Äù

title: A Complete Timeline of Zendaya and Tom Holland‚Äôs Romantic Relationship
text:
Spider-Man: No Way Home co-stars Zendaya and Tom Holland finally confirmed they are in a romantic relationship after years of off and on rumors that they were dating. They've been playing love interests Peter Parker and MJ in the franchise since 2017, but met on set in 2o16. They've obviously been close, but it was in July of 2021 that the paparazzi caught them kissing at a stop light, giving those rumors some more legitimacy. 
The couple still plays their personal lives very privately, but these are the notable moments in the timeline of their relationship so far. 
Holland was the first to post a photo of Zendaya, but soon they were appearing on one another's Instagram feeds regularly. In July 2016, he shared a pic of them with another friend at the pool, captioned, ‚ÄúSummer Sunday's.‚Äù
Zendaya posted their shared Hollywood Reporter cover just a few months later, writing, ‚ÄúAmidst all the chaos and sadness...this one good thing did happen to me today. Honored to share it with the very best...Spider-Man himself.‚Äù 
Holland and Zendaya's chemistry onscreen transferred easily to the red carpet, and photos of them being playful with one another at the San Diego Comic-Con were widely circulated by fans.
In May 2017, they start attending events together, possibly because of promotional opportunities, but photos taken of them show a more personal relationship, like this photo from the MTV Movie and TV Awards.
Throughout the month, they're frequently photographed together as they promote Spider-Man, but it seems like the easy chemistry of two familiar colleagues. 
In July 2017, a source confirms to People magazine that they are together.
‚ÄúThey started seeing each other while they were filming Spider-Man,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôve been super careful to keep it private and out of the public eye, but they‚Äôve gone on vacations with each other and try and spend as much time as possible with one another.‚Äù
A second insider added, ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre both really ambitious, and they challenge each other‚Äîbut, most importantly, they make each other crack up. They seem to have a really similar sense of humor and love joking around together. They have great banter back and forth.‚Äù 
Before the Spider-Man: Homecoming premiere in June, Holland was gushing to People about his friendship with Zendaya, saying, ‚ÄúWe are like the best of friends. She‚Äôs so great and amazing. I‚Äôm a little worried [about dealing with fame ‚Ä¶ [but] Zendaya is super famous and she‚Äôs been through this and I just call her up and say, ‚ÄòHow do I manage being famous?‚Äô I‚Äôm very glad I have a friend like her.‚Äù
The pair addressed the dating rumors above by tweeting to one another about the idea they've gone on vacation together.
‚ÄúWait wait...my favorite is when it says we go on vacations together HA! I haven't been on a vacation in years! hbu?‚Äù Zenday wrote to Holland.
He joked back, ‚ÄúDoes the press tour count?‚Äù
@Zendaya Does the press tour count üòÇüòù https://t.co/2WsstZPyde
The next month, Zendaya denied the rumors again in an interview with Variety.
‚ÄúWe are friends,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs a great dude. He‚Äôs literally one of my best friends. This past how many months we‚Äôve had to do press tours together. There‚Äôs very few people that will understand what that‚Äôs like at 20 years old.‚Äù 
The next month, Zendaya told fans she'd been cheated on in the past and why it left her a bit skeptical about relationships early in life. The actress is currently 25-years-old, so at the time she was just out of her teen years.
‚ÄúI‚Äôm so anti being in a committed relationship when you‚Äôre young and people are learning and growing, because when people are young, they make bad decisions sometimes because they don‚Äôt know any better,‚Äù she explained. ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt mean they don‚Äôt know the difference between right and wrong‚Äîit just means that they‚Äôre still in the experimental phase in their life where they haven‚Äôt made the right decisions yet‚Ä¶it‚Äôs very hard to be in a relationship when the both of you are still figuring out life. You cannot change anybody. You cannot make someone grow up faster than they‚Äôre supposed to.‚Äù
At this point, Holland has met Zendaya's parents, meeting them at a steakhouse in New York.
In March 2018, the two stars sat together at the Oscars, though they walked the carpet separately. They were seen later that month at a comic book store in Los Angeles.
Zendaya attended the Met Gala, wearing a Joan of Arc-inspired chainmail Versace gown, and Holland posted a photo of her to his Instagram writing, ‚ÄúAll hail the queen. Killing it mate.‚Äù
The next month, Zendaya posted a video of Holland goofing off with a lightsaber to wish him a happy birthday. She captioned the video: ‚ÄúHappy birthday loser‚Ä¶‚Äù 
In September, Holland celebrated Zendaya's birthday with a paparazzi photo from their date at the comic book store and a statue of Spider-Man. 
‚ÄúMe, myself and the birthday girl. Happy birthday mate - keep killing it and paving the way for the rest of us,‚Äù he wrote adding a heart. (Seems like he likes calling her ‚Äúmate‚Äù a lot.)
But then a few days later, Skai Jackson‚Äôs mother said on Instagram that they are, in fact, a couple.
‚ÄúYes. It's true. They been on the low for a while,‚Äù she wrote.
She then denied she was the commenter using her screen name., ‚ÄúNothing posted or said was me. I could [sic] care less or know who was dating who. Please stop asking.‚Äù Okay then!  
Holland and Zendaya begin their Spider-Man: Far From Home press tour, and when Holland posts an Instagram of himself, Zendaya, and co-star Jacob Batalon, he accidentally tags her name in a very suggestive place.
‚ÄúI'm assuming because you don't know how to work ig, that's the reasoning behind my name placement,‚Äù she commented with five laughing emojis.
Holland  edits the tag and writes, ‚ÄúThanks @zendaya for making me aware of my obvious blunder.‚Äù 
Holland shoots down the Zendaya dating rumors again. The actor tells ELLE in an interview that he is single and not romantically involved with anyone. He admits he is ‚Äúdefinitely a relationship person. I‚Äôm not the fleeting type at all; it‚Äôs not my way of life.‚Äù  
Zendaya is seen with her Euphoria costar Jacob Elordi and they  are spotted together on vacation in Greece. Again, Zendaya never confirms she's dating Elordi, but paparazzi did catch Elordi giving her a kiss in New York City in February 2020. By September of that year, Elordi seems to be dating Kaia Gerber (but they broke up in November 2021.)
Tom Holland appears to go Instagram official with his girlfriend Nadia Parkes, who he was supposedly spending lockdown with in London. 
Then, two years after denying they're a couple, the Spider-Man co-stars were spotted together in Holland's car sharing a kiss at a red light in LA. They were then seen in the Silver Lake neighborhood the same day, leaving Zendaya's mother Claire Stoermer's residence. 
Holland and Zendaya are photographed at a friend's wedding for an Instagram story. In the photo, Zendaya is leaning into Holland and he has his hand on her sleeve in an intimate gesture.

Later that month, Zendaya posts photos of herself on the red carpet for the Venice Film Festival in her Balmain dress, looking stunning. Holland commented with three flame emojis, because she's definitely looking hot hot hot.
Holland once again posts Zendaya to his timeline, this time with a photo of her on the red carpet for Dune, captioned with a hearts-eye emoji.
A day later, Zendaya was also promoting Dune, this time with co-star Timoth√©e Chalamet. The pair were testing one another's friendship knowledge for a BuzzFeed video when Chalamet was asked who Zendaya's biggest crush is. 
‚ÄúEasy, Tom Holland!‚Äù Chalamet answers immediately, setting Zendaya off into a fit of giggles.
In an interview with GQ, Tom Holland talks to about relationships and the importance of privacy.
‚ÄúOne of the downsides of our fame is that privacy isn‚Äôt really in our control anymore, and a moment that you think is between two people that love each other very much is now a moment that is shared with the entire world,‚Äù Holland said. 
Zendaya told the outlet something similar, saying, ‚ÄúThe equal sentiment [we both share] is just that when you really love and care about somebody, some moments or things, you wish were your own.‚Ä¶I think loving someone is a sacred thing and a special thing and something that you want to deal with and go through and experience and enjoy amongst the two people that love each other.‚Äù
During the London photo call for Spider-Man: No Way Home, Holland is  interviewed and points to Zendaya, saying, ‚ÄúThere she is‚Äîlooking beautiful, might I add.‚Äù
On December 13, the Los Angeles premiere of the film includes this adorable moment when Holland sees Zendaya walk in and gets stopped in his tracks. They do look stunning together on the red carpet, too.
Later that week, Zendaya posted photos of Holland as Spider-Man at two different ages, writing, ‚ÄúMy Spider-Man, I‚Äôm so proud of you, some things never change and good thing.‚Äù

Zendaya and Tom Holland visited the Louvre in Paris, walking hand-in-hand through the famous museum's galleries. After taking a break from social media over the summer, fans noted Holland's exploring Instagram again. A fan edit of Zendaya looking fantastic in a million outfits was popular on the algorithm, and it eventually reached her boyfriend. The clip is captioned, ‚Äújust zendaya owning the camera,‚Äù and clearly he agreed because he hit the like button.

title: With Thank You For Coming, Bhumi Pednekar Breaks Free (And Gets It On)
text:
The star of the heartfelt Indian sex comedy understands the film‚Äôs intent isn‚Äôt to scandalize; it‚Äôs to unite. 
Bhumi Pednekar knew something was different this time. When the Indian producer Rhea Kapoor first pegged the actress as the potential lead for a new, provocative Hindi-language film, the pandemic was at its peak, an in-person meeting out of the question. But Kapoor insisted they couldn‚Äôt discuss the project over the phone; she needed to see Pednekar‚Äôs face when the elevator pitch reached her ears. Bemused, Pednekar joined the producer on Zoom, where Kapoor laid out the logline, along with a juicy non-sequitur: ‚ÄúOkay, don‚Äôt freak out.‚Äù
The film she presented that day was Thank You For Coming, about the trials and triumphs of Kanika Kapoor, a 32-year-old Indian woman who‚Äôs never once experienced an orgasm‚Äîthough certainly not for lack of trying. But the sex comedy would cover more ground than its billing might suggest: the complexities of female friendship and betrayal; the long shadow of adolescent slut-shaming; the pressure to pop out babies (and still love sex!); the lure and the pitfalls of marriage in an era where so little seems certain, least of all our own commitments. Pednekar agreed to listen to a narration of the script, and was tearing up by the time it had finished.
‚ÄúLook, in my part of the world, a lot of comedies for women aren‚Äôt written,‚Äù she tells me over the phone as her car zips through Mumbai, a few days ahead of Thank You For Coming‚Äôs premiere at the Toronto International Film Festival in September. Already a well-established, award-winning actress in India, Pednekar‚Äôs frequently jumped between genres, from drama to action to comedy, ‚Äúbut it‚Äôs never been front-footed comedy, and it‚Äôs never been a comedy that‚Äôs written by women, a film that‚Äôs being produced by a woman.‚Äù
That, and the subject matter was simply too rich to resist. ‚ÄúFemale desire, female sexuality makes people very, very uncomfortable,‚Äù she says with relish. ‚ÄúBut I love making people uncomfortable. I love making myself uncomfortable.‚Äù
After her film debut in 2015 with Dum Laga Ke Haisha (released internationally as, yes, My Big Fat Bride), Pednekar achieved notoriety in films that cast her as rural women, including in action flicks like Sonchiriya, as well as 2019‚Äôs biographical drama Saand Ki Aankh, in which she played the real-life elderly sharpshooter Chandro Tomar. (‚ÄúSuddenly these films were working, and I was bombarded with them‚Äìwhich is when I figured I needed to switch,‚Äù she told Grazia India in September.) She wanted to prove she could do something based in her own world: Thank You For Coming offered a departure from her earlier small-town stories, as Kanika would be a Delhi food blogger with a background not entirely unlike Pednekar‚Äôs own.
In Thank You For Coming‚Äînow playing in select theaters‚Äîmany of Kanika‚Äôs hold-ups about sex and marriage stem from the bullying she was subjected to as a teenager. Her gynecologist mother (played in the film by Natasha Rastogi) gave birth to Kanika out of wedlock; she refused to marry Kanika‚Äôs father and chose, instead, to raise her as an independent businesswoman and a single parent. Even in Delhi, this choice gave way to the neighbors‚Äô ire. 
Despite her tendency to try on boyfriends like costumes, Kanika can never settle into a relationship that seems to satisfy both parties, literally or figuratively. (Case in point: She loses her virginity in a Lightning McQueen bed.) Instead, she‚Äôs unceremoniously dumped on more than one occasion, and stuck drunkenly bickering with her mother and her grandmother, indulging in intergenerational butting-of-heads as the former urges her independence and the latter her stability. Mercifully, it‚Äôs Kanika‚Äôs girlfriends who are the first to hear when‚Äîafter one fateful, booze and neon-soaked engagement party‚ÄîKanika finally achieves climax. The only issue is, when she wakes the next morning, she isn‚Äôt sure whom to thank. Her bumbling betrothed, Jeevan (Pradhuman Singh Mall)? Her ex-boyfriend? Or‚Äîshit‚Äîthat one sweets vendor she was eyeing after a few drinks?
The ‚Äúwhat happened last night‚Äù caper is about as unique a trope as the ‚Äúawkward-guy-gets-hot-girl‚Äù (often, they‚Äôre one and the same), but Pednekar‚Äôs comedic intuition and uninhibited physicality make Thank You For Coming not only funny, but freeing. There‚Äôs remarkably little material in the film designed specifically to scandalize; the message is not one of goading but of guiding. After all, how many of our own wild-night anecdotes have ultimately transformed into poignant wisdom, passed between friends and lovers, mothers and daughters, the once-profane now practically sacred? 
It‚Äôs a tradition Pednekar knows well, having been raised by her single mother after her father died of cancer 12 years ago. ‚ÄúIf she didn‚Äôt have the female friendships that she has in her life, I think my life would have definitely shaped up a lot different,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúThey all were there supporting her, nurturing her through a time that was so, so tough. And because I‚Äôve seen that growing up, for me, my girlfriends are so important. They‚Äôve set the bar so high of all the emotional tick marks that a man needs to [check].‚Äù
One of those emotional tick marks‚Äîfor Pednekar herself, as well as for Kanika as a character‚Äîis the ability for a man to listen (and accept) when a woman speaks openly about her desire. ‚ÄúEspecially in my country, consent, loving yourself, the importance of sex, enjoying sex‚Äîit‚Äôs not something that is spoken of,‚Äù Pednekar says. ‚ÄúIf you speak about the want to have sex, or if you discuss your sexual life openly‚ÄîI mean, they look at you like, Oh my God, you‚Äôre a creature from a different part of the world. Because it scares people. Your freedom scares people. And that‚Äôs exactly what this film is about.‚Äù 
Pednekar finds the cultural cognitive dissonance appalling: Not only is there stigma against women as sexual beings, but there‚Äôs an equally pervasive pressure for those women to find spouses‚Äîbefore time runs out!‚Äîwith whom to have lots of sex. ‚ÄúSadly, there‚Äôs so much pressure to just find that perfect man,‚Äù Pednekar says. ‚ÄúYou do some of the silliest things. You hurt yourself. You hurt people around yourself; you lower your standards. Why the fuck should I lower my standards?‚Äù She continues, adding that settling down with a family becomes ‚Äúlike this holy gospel that you have to pray to. And then everything else is secondary, which means your life, your desires, your wants, your ambitions, what you want to do.‚Äù
Even with a project as relatively tame as Thank You For Coming‚Äîat least when compared to contemporary rated-R comedies in Hollywood‚ÄîPednekar was prepared to deal with naysayers in her home country and abroad. She knew plenty of critics would ignore the film‚Äôs elaborate choreographed dance sequences, its pointed jokes about gender politics (‚ÄúFemi-sanam, femi-sanam, whatever it is, that is what has brainwashed women!‚Äù), and its plainly rendered sincerity in favor of its supposed shock value. But when the trailer first dropped in September, Pednekar was surprised by the flood of positive comments from fans, ‚Äúespecially amongst the women, and amongst all my friends from the LGBTQIA-plus communities, and many, many boys,‚Äù she says. Then, adding an important caveat: ‚ÄúThe ones that are evolved.‚Äù
But the ultimate impact of Thank You For Coming‚Äîespecially as it approached its ritzy TIFF premiere‚Äîdidn‚Äôt land with Pednekar until a member of her own staff approached her with some feedback upon the trailer‚Äôs debut. This woman, Pednekar says, is ‚Äúfrom a small village,‚Äù where, ‚Äúif a boy and a girl are holding hands, it‚Äôs a big deal. And she‚Äôs like, ‚ÄòYeah, all my sisters and my mother saw it, and they really like your trailer.‚Äô‚Äù Pedenekar wasn‚Äôt sure she believed her. ‚ÄúI was like, ‚ÄòAre you sure? They didn‚Äôt feel uncomfortable?‚Äô‚Äù 
The woman responded with a Hindi phrase that Pednekar translates, roughly, for me in English: ‚ÄúThis is the reality of it, right?‚Äù In other words: Who cares if Thank You For Coming is uncomfortable? It‚Äôs also honest. 
‚ÄúI was like, shit, we actually underestimate our audiences,‚Äù Pednekar says. ‚ÄúWoman to woman, you know what I mean. We might not be from the same social background. We might not be from the same class. We might not have the same education. We‚Äôre not from the same geographical location. But you know what I mean.‚Äù

title: How to Bleach Your Hair at Home: Featuring Expert Tips from Hair Colorists
text:
Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.
Colorists break down the steps (and precautions) you need to take before you go blonde.  
So, you‚Äôve decided to switch up your look and go full-fledged blonde, now what? For one, you could book a professional hair appointment‚Äî which honestly might be the most sensible solution. However, if you‚Äôre trying to save a few coins or if you simply don‚Äôt have time to spend all day in a salon chair, perhaps you've come to the conclusion that bleaching your hair at home is the only option left. 
Although you‚Äôre probably aware of this, we feel compelled to remind you that there are a few caveats that come along with DIY bleaching. Since bleach is a harsh chemical, you could run the risk of irritating your scalp or damaging your hair strands, so it‚Äôs essential to take all the necessary precautions to ensure that you‚Äôre prioritizing the health of your hair.
To make your at-home bleach journey a bit easier, we‚Äôve consulted a few experts to help you achieve healthy-looking blonde strands. Ahead, you‚Äôll notice a 12-step bleaching process, along with tips and tricks from hair colorist and R+ Co Collective member Richy Kandasamy and Wella Colorcharm and Clairol Professional Top Artist Oliver Adams. We‚Äôve also made sure to feature a number of hair care products that you‚Äôll need in the process, including bleaching kits, shampoos, and leave-in creams. 
Let's go blonde!
How does your hair feel? Can it truly handle the damage that you‚Äôre about to do to it? Kandasamy recommends beginning with a test. ‚ÄúConduct an elasticity strand test,‚Äù he says. ‚ÄúSpray some water on a piece of hair, and let it absorb‚Äîstretch the wet hair very gently. If the wet hair stretches more than usual, or the texture turns a bit gummy, it is not safe to dye, if the hair goes back to its natural state, it‚Äôs in good condition to bleach.‚Äù He also recommends doing a patch test with a bleach mixture to see how your hair will react using the same method afterward with the small area of processed hair. 
 Additionally, it‚Äôs important to understand your current hair color situation. If your hair is already processed, if you have used any type of box dye, or if you have virgin, unprocessed hair, these can cause variations in how your hair will lift with the bleach. 
You‚Äôre going to need a few items in your tool kit before you begin. 
When beginning to prep your hair Kandasamy recommends sectioning your hair in four parts.  For added protection, rub coconut oil from the root to tip within sectioned hair to hydrate hair. ‚ÄúUsing coconut oil before lightening hair can be very beneficial for the condition of the hair,‚Äù adds Kandasamy. ‚ÄúYou want it to absorb into your hair for at least one hour, even longer if possible and then you can pre-light or bleach.‚Äù 
Once all the necessary materials and prep have been done (and you‚Äôve fully committed to going blonde) you‚Äôre ready to make the bleach mixture.
For each of the sections that you‚Äôve divided, you‚Äôll follow the below instructions. Kandasamy and Adams both suggest taking small portions within the sections of your hair and saturating the strands to make sure the hair is completely covered. 
‚ÄúApply the bleach with 30 volume to mid-length and ends about two inches away from the scalp,‚Äù says Kandasamy. ‚ÄúThen, right after, I‚Äôd apply the bleach with 20 volume on the roots.‚Äù This is the best method to use to avoid hot roots. Adams explains that hot roots are what happens when you apply bleach to the hair (from root to tip) at once and after processing the roots become a much lighter blonde shade compared to the yellow hair of the length. ‚ÄúThe hair closest to the scalp processes color quicker than anywhere else on the hair shaft because the natural heat from the body acts as a heater when hair color is applied,‚Äù he explains. ‚ÄúThis means that when you are doing a virgin application, [treating] hair that hasn't been color-treated, you must apply the color on the roots last, not first.‚Äù
Kandasamy also recommends making sure you use enough bleach mixture on your strands.  Once the mixture has been applied, just pop on a shower cap or plastic bag and set your timer.
Okay, let‚Äôs talk hair levels and wait time. ‚ÄúProcessing time depends on the manufacturer recommendation and also the natural level of starting point and end result desired,‚Äù says Kandasamy.  
It might be confusing, but like Kandasamy said, it‚Äôs important to understand what hair level (shade) you‚Äôre starting with and what color you want to achieve to figure out how long the bleach mixture should stay on your head. This chart from Wella shows exactly what a hair level is.
‚ÄúThe level system for hair tells you how light or dark your color is going to be, one is the darkest and 10 is the lightest.‚Äù Adams explains.  ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs important to understand that all blondes must be at least level seven or above, so if you are starting at a level one, you have to lift your hair six levels to even begin to see any type of blonde.‚Äù
Once you figure out your hair level and how light you want it, you can determine the wait time. If you want your hair to lift as light as possible, then leave the mixture on for 35-4o minutes (remember to never exceed 45 minutes). Adams recommends checking your hair to see if it‚Äôs lifted to the level you desire and says, ‚Äúyou wouldn‚Äôt want to lift hair from one to seven if you only need to lift it to four or five.‚Äù
When it‚Äôs fully processed, it‚Äôs time to wash it out. Use lukewarm water, too hot or cold of water can shock your hair in its already fragile state. Make sure to completely rinse out the bleach and gently wash your hair to get out all the product.
Don‚Äôt freak out! Your hair may look yellow or orange even and that‚Äôs okay, it just means you might have to bleach again. Make sure you assess and check the health of your hair using the stretch technique Kandasamy recommended in the first step. Using the hair level chart discussed in Step 6, determine your hair level to see if you need to bleach your hair again. If you do need to bleach again, follow steps three to seven again (your hair needs to be dry). 
Most importantly, make sure to give your hair enough recovery time and consider waiting a couple of days, weeks, or even months before attempting another bleach treatment. You might not achieve your desired results on the first try so it‚Äôs important to be patient. Adding excessive amounts of bleach to your hair can lead to something called over-processing, which is when your hair shaft becomes brittle and damaged. Over-processing can also cause breakage and hair loss which is the last thing you want to deal with, so make sure that you‚Äôre treating your hair with care.  
Remember the color wheel from elementary school? This is where that comes into play. Toner will help neutralize any brassiness or yellow hues that will be lingering in your hair after bleaching. 
Before you can tone, just make sure that your hair is light enough (remember the chart in Step 6). ‚ÄúIt is important to understand that if the hair hasn‚Äôt been lifted light enough or to the proper level, putting a toner on it is not going to fix the problem and could possibly create a very unpleasant color,‚Äù Adams says. So always make sure you are using toner on the correct [hair] level.‚Äù
Toner can be applied to slightly damp hair and uses the same 2:1 mixing ratio and application method as the bleach.
Similar to the toner, a purple shampoo helps eliminate orange or yellow hues in your hair. Using a non-chemical toner (purple shampoo) is a great way to upkeep your blonde hair to keep it from getting brassy. Use a purple shampoo once or week or whenever your hair starts to get too yellow. 
My personal favorite is the Matrix Total Results Brass Off, but there are tons of great purple shampoos to choose from.
After all the chemical damage you just did to your hair, it‚Äôs important to replenish those strands. ‚ÄúMy best advice is to always use a professional haircare product once or twice a week, [like] a hydrating hair mask,‚Äù says Kandasamy. Also, according to Adams you should avoid using heat on your hair:‚ÄúYou will want to minimize thermal heat like excessive blow-drying and ceramic heat styling in the 3-4 weeks after bleaching your hair.‚Äù
At this point you‚Äôre blonde! Since this is an at-home hair job, it might look different than what you thought, but embrace that you did it by yourself and rock it with pride! In case you're still nervous or unsure, here's a round-up of YouTube videos that can help you on your blonde journey.
Richy Kandasamy is a hair colorist and a R+Co Collective Member.
Oliver Adams is a hair colorist and a top artist for both Wella Colorcharm and Clairol Professional.

title: All About Bianca Censori, Kanye West‚Äôs Wife
text:
Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.
Less than one year after Kim Kardashian and Kanye West were declared legally single in March 2022, West has seemingly remarried, and his alleged new wife actually works for his company, Yeezy. 
TMZ reported on January 13 that West and Bianca Censori recently had a private wedding-like ceremony, although they haven‚Äôt yet filed a marriage certificate to make it legal. West was seen wearing a gold wedding band while at lunch with Censori in Beverly Hills on Monday, January 9, and the outlet reports he released a song about her, ‚ÄúCensori Overload‚Äù last month.
West has kept a lower profile since his disturbing antisemitic remarks and Hilter comments generated public outrage and lost him numerous business deals, including his lucrative Adidas Yeezy collection, and his billionaire status in October. Kardashian has not commented on West‚Äôs alleged new marriage, and Censori and West have only been sighted together very recently, per TMZ.
Here, all you need to know about Censori and her connection to West.
Censori is Australian. Her exact age isn‚Äôt public, but The Sun reports she‚Äôs believed to be around 28. Her LinkedIn describes her as having finished high school in 2012 and her undergraduate degree in 2017. Her position on the page is listed as head of architecture at Yeezy. She‚Äôs been a brunette in the past, but recently went blonde and short in new photos with West.
Censori earned both bachelor‚Äôs and master‚Äôs degrees in architecture at the University of Melbourne. She finished her master‚Äôs education in 2020 and received her bachelor‚Äôs degree in 2017. She previously was a student architect at DP Toscano Architects from July 2017 to June 2020 prior to starting at Yeezy in November 2020, per her LinkedIn.
Censori was asked how she got into architecture. ‚ÄúI was born and raised in Melbourne, Australia,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúAs a child I was consistently drawn to creative endeavors, mostly artistic. I always wanted to be a sculptor and to me, architecture is the union of art and pragmatics. It is the grandest artistic gesture that we can place onto the earth. I was drawn to it, purely, as a shift in artistic scale.‚Äù
‚ÄúAs a child, I spent a lot of time with my aunt who would consistently expose me to an array of art, film, and architecture,‚Äù she continued of what fueled her interest in the craft. ‚ÄúShe really drove my love for design and instilled in me an eye for aesthetics that I was able to nurture into adulthood.‚Äù
West‚Äôs romance with Censori, at least publicly, is very new. It‚Äôs unclear when the two started dating. TMZ reported that Censori and West were seen at the Waldorf Astoria Beverly Hills sharing a meal on Jan. 9, 2023. On January 13, when it reported on their alleged marriage, the outlet added that while West and Censori weren‚Äôt seen or photographed together side by side, she had been at ‚Äúsome Kanye-adjacent events, including a Balenciaga show in May.‚Äù
Multiple sources connected to Censori and West told the outlet on January 13 that the couple ‚Äúrecently had a private ceremony to celebrate their love‚Äù but didn‚Äôt appear to file a marriage certificate yet to make it legal. West was seen wearing a gold ring to symbolize his commitment to her, TMZ reported.
On Friday, October 6, it was reported in documents obtained by the Daily Mail that the couple did get a ‚Äúconfidential‚Äù marriage license in California on December 20, 2022. Their wedding date was set one month after West's divorce was settled with ex-wife Kim Kardashian. 
The license was never made public record before because of its ‚Äúconfidential‚Äù status, but the marriage took place in Palo Alto, and was officiated by James Mayfield. Censori's full name is on the license as well as West's legal name, which was changed to ‚ÄúYe‚Äù in October 2021. Their marital home is listed as West‚Äôs Wyoming ranch. 
Daily Mail noted that what appeared to be Censori‚Äôs Instagram account (@bianca.censori) is now unavailable following news of her and West‚Äôs alleged marriage. Censori had 16,500 followers and just 27 posts before the handle was seemingly deactivated.
Yesterday evening, West‚Äôs ex-wife posted two quotes on her Instagram Story around the time news of the ‚Äúmarriage‚Äù came out. ‚ÄúJust remember, the black sheep turns into the goat. Keep doing you,‚Äù one read. Another that followed said, ‚ÄúPeople who want to see you win, will help you win. Remember that.‚Äù 
Kardashian broke into tears when discussing how hard co-parenting with West had been in an interview released in late December, especially given his hateful public comments. West and Kardashian share four children: North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalm.
‚ÄúOne day my kids will thank me...for not bashing their dad,‚Äù she said at one point. She added later, ‚ÄúI definitely protected him, and I still will in the eyes of my kids. For my kids. So, in my home, my kids don‚Äôt know anything that goes on [in] the outside world.‚Äù
A source told Page Six a few days after news of the marriage broke that Kardashian ‚Äúhates‚Äù Censori, and has obviously been aware of her for some time.
‚ÄúKim hates her,‚Äù said the insider. ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs pretty. And Kim hates pretty girls.‚Äù
TMZ pointed out that West released a song with Censori‚Äôs name in the track title last month. Its beginning verse, ‚ÄúAnd The Bible said / I can‚Äôt have anymore sex / Till marriage,‚Äù may be a hint, the outlet speculated, about West‚Äôs sudden decision to get remarried.
Angelina Censori, Bianca's sister, recently told the Herald Sun, according to the Daily Mail, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs very exciting news for both my sister and the family, but we choose to have some privacy for the time being.‚Äù
Alyssia Censori, another relative of Bianca, said that she was ‚Äúsuper happy for them both.‚Äù
On January 22, a new report from The Herald Sun stated that Kanye may be heading to Melbourne to officially meet everyone. A source said that the pair, ‚Äúwill spend time in Ivanhoe, east of the CBD, where Censori grew up.‚Äù]
Kardashian wasn't against Censori and West's union, as long as she is positive force to West. The source said, ‚ÄúBianca has been around their kids. Kim, ultimately, just wants Kanye to be at peace. So if Bianca helps with that, then it‚Äôs fine.‚Äù
Fans spotted the couple in Tokyo in late June. At one point, West took photos with a fan while Censori was photographed in their vehicle, holding a Hello Kitty doll.
On June 11, Censori made headlines for being photographed holding hands with West's oldest child North at his birthday party.
In early August, West and Censori were traveling around Italy, and walking barefoot through the ancient cities of Florence and Rome. They even went sans footwear to a Travi Scott concert and while visiting a fabric factory in the Prato East district.
Jason Lee, who formerly worked as West‚Äôs head of media and partnerships, told Page Six that he thinks the barefoot look is a PR stunt.
‚ÄúI think the fact that people are talking about Kanye‚Äôs feet shows just how much power he still has in the wake of cancel culture,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs a smart and strategic move. I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if the next time we saw shoes on his feet it would be a project that he designed.‚Äù
Censori drew some outrage from locals for dressing very provocatively, wearing near naked, sheer bodysuits in Italy where her nipples were visible. But after West himself had a wardrobe malfunction where his butt was exposed on a boat, sources spoke to TMZ about how Kardashian felt about their vacation coverage. She isn‚Äôt concerned. Kardashian ‚Äúisn‚Äôt staying up to date‚Äù on West and his personal life, the sources claimed, noting she is only focused on co-parenting affairs. The sources added that Kardashian viewed West‚Äôs NSFW photos vas just an ‚Äúunfortunate‚Äù wardrobe malfunction that paparazzi caught.
A source additionally spoke to Page Six on September 1 about a false tabloid report that Kardashian wanted to warn Censori about West.
‚ÄúShe absolutely does not want to talk to her [Censori],‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúKim is actually a firm believer in letting people be on their own journey and figure out life. She would never call someone and warn them.‚Äù
Venetian Turismo Motoscafi, the company who rented the boat where West's derriere was exposed said in a statement to Daily Mail Australia on Sunday September 3 that the couple is ‚Äúno longer be welcome‚Äù on their ships.
They stated that their employees were ‚Äúcompletely unaware‚Äù of what was happening at the time, blaming a ‚Äúthird person on board the taxi‚Äù who ‚Äúobstructed the captain‚Äôs view‚Äù
‚ÄúThe driver had to keep a lookout for traffic and did not see these obscenities,‚Äù the company said. ‚ÄúIf this had happened, he would have immediately disembarked and reported the transgressors to those in authority.‚Äù
They added, ‚ÄúWe completely dissociate ourselves from such acts and behavior. Mr. West and his wife will certainly no longer be welcome on board our company‚Äôs boats.‚Äù 
In early September, shortly after their trip to Italy, a source told US Weekly that Censori's friends have grown concerned about how her marriage has swept her away from them.
‚ÄúBianca‚Äôs friends are becoming concerned because their friendship with her hasn‚Äôt been the same in quite some time,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúBianca has always been a strong, independent woman who has her own voice, but they haven‚Äôt seen that lately because they don‚Äôt speak or see each other as often as they had before she started seeing Kanye.‚Äù
They added that is Censori is ‚Äúhappy, then they‚Äôre happy for her‚Äù but they find it ‚Äúhard to tell... because she‚Äôs been isolated from them.‚Äù
The couple continued their European odyssey in September, heading to Berlin, Germany, where they were photographed waiting in line for a meal at the popular eatery, Mustafa‚Äôs Gem√ºse Kebap. In the photos, Censori is wearing her signature see-through, strapless nude bodysuit over a pair of high-waisted underwear. She was also carrying a backpack and walking in clear heels with pointed toes.
West wore black from head-to-toe, with his face shrouded by his extendable collar. They each got a kebab, stopping to eat on a nearby bench.
Censori's outfits, particularly her see-through body stockings, have drawn a lot of attention as the couple cavorts through Europe. Sources talking to Page Six says that the looks are put together by Laura Beham of the Zurich-based design collective Proto-types per West and his team's instructions.
They stated that the rapper has a ‚Äúwhole atelier in Italy.‚Äù 
‚ÄúAnything he wants to make they can make it. He‚Äôs really just making it on the spot,‚Äù said Mowalola Ogunlesi, the London-based designer who worked with West on his Yeezy Gap collab. ‚ÄúThey just buy tights and style it and cut it on [Censori] ‚Ä¶ Usually they get Wolford. Tights are not safe when they‚Äôre around.‚Äù
An anonymous source confirmed Ogunlesi's statements, saying, ‚ÄúThey design it and have an in-house team that creates everything in a day.‚Äù  
Sources painted a disturbing picture of West and Censori‚Äôs relationship and West‚Äôs power over Censori to Daily Mail in early October. One source said, ‚ÄúKanye has a set of rules for Bianca, which includes never speak and wear what he wants her to wear. She is also required to eat certain food items and to work out even though Kanye doesn‚Äôt work out. She has no mind of her own anymore and obeys him because he has convinced her that they are royal.‚Äù
A second source claimed that her friends have been trying and failing to stage an intervention. ‚Äú[She] is stuck and her friends are trying to save her, but no one can because of the blockades Kayne has put up [around her],‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúEveryone is extremely concerned. This isn‚Äôt who she is. She is an incredibly outspoken and lively person who is never one to keep her mouth shut.‚Äù
