‚ÄúWhen she wants something to work, she will make it work,‚Äù the source explained. ‚ÄúHer family‚Äôs issue with Tristan is that they think he won‚Äôt change. But Khlo√© isn‚Äôt listening to this. She has been very firm with Tristan, and she believes he wants to keep his family together as well.‚Äù
Khlo√© commented for the first time on Twitter about her relationship in response to a fan wondering why she didn't leave ‚Äúthat wasteman Tristan.‚Äù The fan wrote, ‚ÄúShe preaches about women knowing their self worth and when to walk away, but when it's time to walk the walk, she's a hypocrite.‚Äù
Kardashian responded directly to the fan, tweeting, ‚ÄúNot exactly Queen Persia, you have no knowledge of what goes on in our household or the enormous rebuilding this takes to even coexist. I‚Äôm proud of my strength. I appreciate your opinion and I hope you hold that same opinion to everyone else who has stayed in situations.‚Äù 
Things apparently were rocky, with an insider telling People and Us Weekly that Khlo√© and Tristan were together but growing apart.
‚ÄúKhlo√© and Tristan are still not fully okay,‚Äù Us‚Äô source said. ‚ÄúThey act like they are when they‚Äôre in front of others, but it‚Äôs all a show at this point.‚Äù
A second source told Us that Tristan was unhappy. 
‚ÄúTristan is feeling trapped in a bad relationship. He‚Äôs no longer going with Khlo√© for [couple‚Äôs therapy] sessions. He just didn‚Äôt feel it was helping to discuss sh-t that happened months ago.‚Äù
Khlo√© was frustrated too, according to the source.
‚ÄúKhlo√© carried his child and is much more in the limelight than he is, and she doesn‚Äôt think he understands the consequences of his decisions,‚Äù the source explained. "She thinks the cheating scandal is a way bigger deal than he does, and he doesn‚Äôt fully understand the repercussions of his actions affecting not only him and Khlo√© but the entire family as a whole."
She was particularly sensitive because her ex-husband Lamar Odom was guilty of the same transgression. A source told People that Tristan was having trouble adjusting to being in the limelight.
‚ÄúWhen he got with Khlo√©, he tried to adapt to the best of his ability, but he struggled with being part of such a high-profile family and crossed lines he shouldn‚Äôt have,‚Äù People's source said. ‚ÄúHe wasn‚Äôt expecting such major backlash from the public and it‚Äôs been a lot for him to handle.‚Äù
Khlo√© spent Thanksgiving in Cleveland with Tristan and True, away from her family. Fans were suspicious that the Kardashians and Jenner don't want him around. 
She responded to that by tweeting, ‚ÄúY‚Äôall are reaching now. I‚Äôve spent the past 3 years in Cleveland for Thanksgiving. Not sure why people are trying to create drama between my family and I. My sisters and I are perfectly fine thank you! All of their families were able to travel but TT being in season, he can not.‚Äù
Y‚Äôall are reaching now. I‚Äôve spent the past 3years in Cleveland for Thanksgiving. Not sure why people are trying to create drama between my family and I. My sisters and I are perfectly fine thank you! All of their families were able to travel but TT being in season, he can not
She later added, ‚ÄúThe truth is never as fun as some story some of you like to create. So here we goooooooooooo!! Happy Thanksgiving I guess lol.‚Äù
TMZ reports that the couple had split over allegations that Tristan was seen kissing Jordyn Woods, Kylie Jenner's best friend at the time, just after spending Valentine's Day with Khlo√©.
The basketball star was reportedly seen ‚Äúsnuggling up‚Äù and ‚Äúmaking out‚Äù with Jordyn Woods at a house party, and when Khlo√© found out, the source said, ‚Äúshe has had enough.‚Äù
‚ÄúFAKE NEWS,‚Äù Tristan initially tweeted just after the news broke.
The week before, E! reported that though they were technically together, it didn't necessarily look good.
‚ÄúShe chooses not to worry about it or to classify their relationship anymore,‚Äù E!'s source explained, saying Khlo√© was mostly in Los Angeles while Tristan toured with his team, and that she is ‚Äúvery happy with things the way they are and feels very fulfilled. She doesn't need to think about what's up with Tristan or what he's doing out on the road like she used to.‚Äù 
Later that month, Woods appeared on Red Table Talk episode with Jada Pinkett Smith for Facebook Watch, where she described her encounter with him. She said, ‚ÄúBut, on the way out [of Tristan's house] he did kiss me. No passion, no nothing. On the way out he just kissed me. It was a kiss on the lips. No tongue kiss, no making out. Nothing. I don't think he's wrong either, because I allowed myself to be in this position.‚Äù
She continued, ‚ÄúI didn't know how to feel. I was like, ‚ÄòThat didn't just happen,‚Äô because I was leaving already so I walked out immediately after. And I got in the car and was like, ‚ÄòNo, that didn't happen,‚Äô I [told him] I need to go. I was in shock.‚Äù
Khlo√© tweeted out that she did not blame Woods the way she blamed Tristan for what happened.
Tristan is equally to blame but Tristan is the father of my child. Regardless of what he does to me I won‚Äôt do that to my daughter. He has been addressing this situation PRIVATELY. If Tristan were to lie publicly about what conspired,then yes I would address him publicly as well
This has been an awful week & I know everyone is sick of hearing about it all (as am I). I‚Äôm a rollercoaster of emotions & have said things I shouldn‚Äôt have. Honestly, Tristan cheating on me & humiliating me, wasn‚Äôt such a shock as the first time.
What‚Äôs been harder & more painful is being hurt by someone so close to me. Someone whom I love & treat like a little sister. But Jordyn is not to be blamed for the breakup of my family. This was Tristan‚Äôs fault.
I have to move on with my life & count my blessings, my family, my health, & my beautiful baby True.
People interviewed a source who said that Khlo√© is ‚Äúgreat.‚Äù
‚ÄúHer heartbreak seems to have passed and her mood is much lighter,‚Äù they continued. ‚ÄúAlthough she really wanted Tristan to come around, grow up and be a man, she seems to have realized that she‚Äôs much better off now. Everyone is happy to see her happier.‚Äù
They added, ‚ÄúKhlo√© isn‚Äôt dating, but at least she‚Äôs able to talk and joke about dating. She realizes with True around now, she just needs to be super picky. True [Kardashian's daughter with Thompson] will always be Khlo√©‚Äôs life and number one. Khlo√© is obsessed with her little girl. She really is the most wonderful mom.‚Äù
Tristan spoke out against rumors that his relationship with Khlo√© overlapped with his and ex-girlfriend Jordan Craig's relationship. Craig was pregnant with the couple's child Prince when he first started seeing Khlo√©.
‚ÄúWhen I met Khloe I was SINGLE,‚Äù he wrote on Twitter. ‚ÄúThe negative comments that are constantly being directed towards her are unnecessary. She does not deserve all this backlash for my wrong doings. Both Khlo√® and Jordan have been nothing but great mothers to my kids.‚Äù
During a radio interview with Ryan Seacrest, Khloe stated that she doesn‚Äôt hold a grudge against her ex or Jordyn Woods.
‚ÄúI‚Äôm not someone who holds a grudge. If I do that it‚Äôs only going to affect me,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúThat chapter is closed for me. I want all of us to move on and to be happy, successful people. I just want everyone to just be better people with each day. That‚Äôs genuinely how I feel.‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúI know everybody makes mistakes. I think it‚Äôs how you handle it, and I think apologies need to be as loud as your disrespect was or to me, it‚Äôs not sincere. I‚Äôm forgiving. I‚Äôm forgiven.‚Äù 
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre all human beings and we‚Äôre all figuring out life,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúStuff happens and people make mistakes, and as long as it doesn‚Äôt define who they are‚Äîas long as they don‚Äôt make those choices define them and they try to evolve and become better people‚Äîwe‚Äôre all gonna survive. We all learn from it.‚Äù
In July of the following year after spending some time in lockdown together, it was rumored by People that the former couple was ‚Äúgiving their relationship another try. Tristan is working hard to prove himself and has been a great dad to True.‚Äù
A second source said they ‚Äúacted like [they] were back together‚Äù during her birthday that summer, and he wrote a glowing tribute to her on social media.
"I‚Äôm wise enough now to know, you came into my life to show me just what it means to be an incredible person," he stated. "I appreciate how I am able to learn from and grow because of you. I thank God for the beautiful and loving woman you are to everyone, especially our daughter True. You deserve the world Koko! True and I love you mama. Happy Birthday @khloekardashian ‚ù§Ô∏èü•≥‚Äù
By February 2021, the pair were supposedly back in a committed relationship, and a source told Entertainment Tonight, ‚ÄúKhlo√© forgives Tristan at this point, but she will never forget. They are back to being committed, are still in love and giving their relationship another chance and hoping that it will succeed this time around. Tristan has been paying extra attention to Khloe and True and has been calling, FaceTiming, texting and sending photos all the time to check in when they are not physically together. He hasn‚Äôt been going out late at night with the boys or other girls.‚Äù
A month later, they went Instagram official for a second time, with Khlo√© wishing him a happy 30th birthday today on Instagram.
She wrote to her boyfriend, ‚ÄúThe ones that are meant to be are the ones who go through everything that is designed to tear them apart and they come out even stronger than they were before. Thank you for showing me everything you said you would. For the father you are. For the best friend I have in you. I‚Äôm thankful that I can do absolutely nothing with you and it feels like everything. I hope you know today and everyday how loved you are by me and so many. Happy birthday TT! Welcome to 30! I can‚Äôt wait for all of the memories. This is when life just starts getting good!‚Äù
Tristan was spotted entering a bedroom with three women at a party, and a source told Daily Mail that ‚ÄúTristan took off into one of the party rooms where everyone goes to hook up‚Äù with the trio and another man. ‚ÄúThey stayed in the room behind closed doors for at least 30 minutes. When he arrived, his shirt looked all pressed and when he came out his shirt was a mess, he looked disheveled.‚Äù
 A source spoke to E!, who said, ‚ÄúThey had been working through the cheating rumors for the last couple of weeks, but Khlo√© told Tristan he lost all of her trust and the relationship could not be repaired. Khlo√© really tried, but ultimately, felt too betrayed by him. She's done and says she will not go back.‚Äù
They added, ‚ÄúThey have been co-parenting and have seen each other several times in the last week with True, but are not romantically together.‚Äù
They continued to co-parent, with a source saying, ‚ÄúKhlo√© is doing okay. True will always be her first priority, and, ultimately, she's focused on a healthy family for her daughter, so Tristan will always be a part of Khlo√©'s life.‚Äù
They added, ‚ÄúShe's not one to dwell on the past‚Äîshe has an incredible capacity to find the positive in every situation. And she and Tristan are still very much in touch and are great co-parents to True.‚Äù
InTouch reported that they have reconciled once more, but Khlo√© denied it.
The Mirror shared  InTouch's report and a Twitter user retweeted the story, writing at Khlo√©, ‚ÄúAt this point @khloekardashian has no self worth. Anyway...‚Äù
She responded, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre telling me you made an assessment about my life because of a random blog? I think that says more about you than it does about me.‚Äù
You‚Äôre telling me you made an assessment about my life because of a random blog? I think that says more about you than it does about me.
At some point in the following months, the couple seemingly reconciled again, but kept it very private considering their past. However, news came out that Tristan fathered a child with personal trainer Maralee Nichols, who was suing the basketball player for child support and other pregnancy-related fees.
Nichols alleged in court documents, according to People, that the baby was conceived in March of that year when Tristan and Kho√© were still together.
Tristan confirmed in an Instagram Story that he was the father of Nichols' baby, and then publicly apologized to Khlo√©.
He wrote:
Khlo√© and Tristan reveal they are expecting a second child together via surrogate, a rep told E! and People. 
The rep said, ‚ÄúWe can confirm True will have a sibling who was conceived in November. Khlo√© is incredibly grateful to the extraordinary surrogate for such a beautiful blessing. We‚Äôd like to ask for kindness and privacy so that Khlo√© can focus on her family.‚Äù 
The baby was allegedly conceived before the Nichols scandal was revealed to Khlo√© and the public, likely in November 2021.
Khlo√© and Tristan welcomed their second child together via surrogate, People reported, and it's a baby boy. 
Buzzfeed and Entertainment Tonight reported that the pair were secretly engaged when the Nichols news broke. She accepted his proposal in February 2021, a month before he cheated with Nichols. 
Khlo√© shared photos from her family's famous annual Christmas party, partially revealing her son's face for the first time, but not his name. The Kardashians star was wearing a red satin ballgown made custom by Lebanese designer Nicolas Jebran, with True wearing an outfit in a matching red.
Tristan's mother Andrea Thompson unexpectedly passed away on January 5 after having a heart attack. E! reported that Khlo√© flew to Toronto to support Tristan right after. ‚ÄúKhloe went with him to comfort and help him navigate what will be a very difficult time,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúShe was incredibly close to his mother.‚Äù
E!'s source explained that broken up or not, Khlo√© remains committed to supporting her ex and co-parent. ‚ÄúLike Khlo√© and the Kardashian family always do, they will come together and support their loved ones in their most difficult time of need,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúTristan is the father of Khloe's kids, and she and her entire family will always be there for him.‚Äù
Kim Kardashian and Kris Jenner join Khlo√© and Tristan for the funeral on January 14, E! reported.
Khlo√© paid tribute to Andrea on her Instagram, writing that she promised to look after Tristan's younger, teen brother Amari, who suffers from epilepsy.
On Friday, March 10, Khlo√© Kardashian celebrated her best friends Malika and Khadijah Haqq‚Äôs 40th birthday in Los Angeles. She was joined by sisters Kim and Kylie and their mom Kris Jenner. She was also joined by her ex. Thompson reportedly arrived two hours after the gals, but he was wearing sparkling silver sneakers that matched Khlo√©'s silver minidress.
He and Khlo√© were also seen leaving the event at the same time, around 1 am, though they left through different exits. Khlo√© exited through the venue's back door, while Thompson left through the front. His appearance at Khlo√©'s best friends' party and in a coordinated ensemble has fans wondering if there's another reconciliation rumor around the corner.
Khlo√© later posted a birthday tribute to Thompson on March 13, 2023. She had to disable comments to her disappointment, and a source told Us Weekly on March 14 that the post did not mean they were back together.
In the tribute, Kardashian wrote, ‚ÄúHappy birthday @realtristan13. You are truly the best father, brother & uncle. Your love, attention, silly dances, hugs, carpool rides, bed time rituals, the way u show up for them. All of the above means more than you‚Äôll ever know to your family of littles. My birthday wish for u is that u continue to crave change, healing, and transformation. Be strong, be kind, be patient, be free. Continue to Make your soul and your mommy proud. Happy birthday baby daddy.‚Äù
A second source told the outlet a day later that Thompson would like to be with Kardashian again though. ‚ÄúTristan is always trying to get Khlo√© back, he still loves her and wants to make it work between them,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre friends and great coparents, but he wants more.‚Äù The source did not address Khlo√©'s feelings about this.
In the June 8 episode of The Kardashians, Kardashian revealed some more details about how she and Thompson are handling their co-parenting duties in a conversation with Kris Jenner, saying boundaries are key.
‚ÄúTristan and I, we always get along great,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHim and I have a great friendship relationship, we get along fine, and for my kids, I will put anything to the side.‚Äù 
She continued, ‚ÄúWhat's done is done, so what would I still be holding on to something for? I don't need to ‚Äòpunish‚Äô him because I'm not getting back with him.‚Äù
Jenner agrees that they seem to have figured out a system as co-parents. 
‚ÄúWhen I'm not around, he's here,‚Äù Kardashian agreed. ‚ÄúI would rather him be here than the nanny.‚Äù 
She continued, ‚ÄúThere's still boundaries, I'm definitely putting my foot down around a lot of things. No one's just here chilling if there's no kids involved.‚Äù
In a later confessional, she explained more about why that was necessary. 
‚ÄúThese boundaries are so important to put into place with Tristan because we've done this song and dance a handful of times already,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI've gotten back with him after a cheating scandal, so I don't know if Tristan is under the impression, ‚ÄòOh wow, OK, let's just ride this out and eventually she'll get back with me.‚Äô‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúI get why he would think that, so it's my job to set boundaries that my actions show otherwise... it's always about the kids, and that's what it is. But we're not just hanging out by ourselves... I keep it very short and sweet and make sure he knows it's always about the kids because it's so easy to fall back. I can't let those old habits easily come into my life. It's just not what I want.‚Äù
On the Thursday, October 5, episode of The Kardashians, Khlo√© and Kim discussed the former's ongoing support of her ex and his younger brother Amari following the passing of his mother Andrea. In particular, why the two brothers are still living with her while Thompson's home is being renovated. 
‚ÄúI definitely feel overwhelmed and I guess stressed at times, but I'm not the one going through most of the pain here,‚Äù Khlo√© said in a confessional.
Kim's perspective was complicated.
‚ÄúI know you guys are gonna hate me for this, and you're gonna hate us, and you're gonna think Khlo√©'s whatever,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúIt's so crazy because he's such a good friend and he's such a good dad, but he just couldn‚Äôt get it together in that area of being a faithful boyfriend.‚Äù
She continued, ‚ÄúYou want to obviously hate him for that. Yeah, of course, his actions and who he was are so f---ed up, I can't deny that, and we've had our talks about it and had our fights about it... but he‚Äôs also shown so many decent things and has been a really good person and friend.‚Äù
She also said the NBA player is supportive of her kids, too, who she shares with former husband Kanye West. Kim claims that Thompson has stepped into a fatherly role with them and defended her when her ex-husband was being publicly combative. 
Later on, Khlo√© got more specific about why she lets him stay.
‚ÄúI'm not na√Øve to fact that my ex-boyfriend is living in my house and that we're in really sensitive times,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúTristan is in the very fresh stages of grieving [his mom]...‚ÄùI never want to be someone that anyone can accuse that I misled them when it comes to love. I think I'm so adamant about that because I've been on the receiving end of it and I just don‚Äôt think love is something you play with.
She went on, ‚ÄúTristan has said before [that] I'm his person. I'm not saying I don‚Äôt believe him but I've heard this, and of course, it's angered me before because I'm like, ‚ÄòIf I f---ing am, then why have you treated me like this and how many times?‚Äô I love love, and I am a hopeless romantic, but that's not gonna change how I feel and what happened.‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúWe're gonna be in each other's lives for the rest of each other's lives because of our kids, so I'm not gonna fight that, and I'm gonna make sure it's as nice as possible for me.‚Äù
In another confessional, she called the multiple cheating scandals ‚Äútraumatic,‚Äù but explained how important it is to her to co-parent their children together. She also sympathized with his loss, having lost her own father at a young age. During the episode, Thompson praised Khlo√© for her ‚Äúpure and great‚Äù soul and she responded in kind.
‚ÄúYou're a good person at your core, that‚Äôs why I was with you,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúEveryone has done dumb s--- in their life, just not everyone does it on a public platform, which sucks ... all of us, we're always rooting for you, we always want the best for you. We believe in you as a person... and just remember, you're not your past.‚Äù

title: Ciara and Russell Wilson's Complete Relationship Timeline
text:
It seems like Ciara and Russell Wilson have been together forever, but they actually met in 2015, and were married only a year after they first connected. Together, the musical artist and Broncos star share three children: their daughter Sienna Princess, their son Win Harrison Wilson, and Ciara's son Future Zahir Wilburn from her former relationship with the rapper Future, whom Wilson treats as his own. 
Here's their complete relationship timeline so far.
The couple met on March 26, 2015, while at a basketball game at the University of Wisconsin. BET reports that Wilson asked Ciara out for dinner, seeing if she could meet him after a business meeting, but she said it was too late. He changed his plans.
‚ÄúI completely forgot about the 10:30 [P.M.] dinner,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúNext thing I knew, it was 12:00 [A.M.], 12:30 [A.M.], and I was sold on you.‚Äù 
Only a month later, they made their first official appearance together at the White House, during an event for Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and his wife, Akie Abe. 
Things went well, and soon, they were walking the red carpet at the BET Awards. 
The couple made headlines when Wilson shared that they had decided to remain celibate until marriage. 
‚ÄúI told somebody that‚Äôs the girl I want to be with before I even met her,‚Äù he explained during an interview with San Diego's The Rock Church. ‚ÄúBefore I met her, I was like, ‚ÄòI‚Äôm probably going to end up with Ciara.‚Äô‚Äù
He continued, ‚ÄúShe was in the dressing room getting ready to go before she went on stage, and she was sitting there, and God spoke to me and said, ‚ÄòI need you to lead her.‚Äô And I was like, ‚ÄòReally?‚Äô And he was like, ‚ÄòNo, I want you to lead her.‚Äô So I told her, ‚ÄòWhat would you do if we took all of that extra stuff off the table and just did it Jesus's way?‚Äô‚Äù
He added, ‚ÄúI ain't going to lie to you all now. I need you all to pray for us. I know you've seen her on the screen. If there's a 10, she's a 15.‚Äù 
The couple made an appearance at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Sports Awards at UCLA, which Wilson was hosting.
Ciara told Cosmopolitan more about their celibacy decision, saying, ‚ÄúYou get to hug and you get to have a nice good kiss, but you have to be careful not to go too far so you don't end up in the place you're trying to avoid being in. Strong, strong, strong, strong! Just the strongest resistance to temptation.‚Äù
In another interview that month with People, Ciara said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not gonna lie. I‚Äôm human, so it is not easy, especially when I look at him, and I think he is the most beautiful thing I‚Äôve ever seen‚Äîthat I‚Äôve ever laid my eyes on, to be honest.‚Äù
They also attended the pre-GRAMMY Gala together and posed for this iconic photo.
A year after meeting, Wilson proposed to Ciara while they were on a trip in the Seychelles with a 16-carat custom diamond ring, according to Us Weekly. 
‚ÄúShe said Yes!!! Since Day 1 I knew you were the one. No Greater feeling... #TrueLove @Ciara,‚Äù he posted on Instagram on March 11, confirming their engagement.
They were married a few months later on July 6 at Peckforton Castle in Cheshire, England, surrounded by friends and family. She wore a Roberto Cavalli gown with custom embroidery, bell lace sleeves, and a laced-up bodice, while Wilson was in a Giorgio Armani suit, People reported at the time. Celebs at the event included Kelly Rowland, Jennifer Hudson, and La La Anthony. 
‚ÄúWe are The Wilsons!‚Äù Ciara wrote over a photo from the day.
Ciara told People, ‚ÄúOur wedding was like a fairytale... We loved the countryside. We looked at a venue in the U.S., but we also looked abroad, and England just seemed magical and perfect.‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúThis is the happiest I have ever been.‚Äù
That fall, the couple announced they were expecting. Ciara shared the news on her 31st birthday, writing on Instagram, ‚ÄúOn this special Birthday I received an abundance of love from friends and family.. and I'm excited to Finally share one of the Greatest Gifts of All that God could give... üë∂üèΩüçºüíÉüèΩ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù
Wearing a floor-length red velvet gown from Jovani Signature to the Vanity Fair Oscar Party in February 2017, Ciara's pregnancy was very visible, and she looked radiant.
Their daughter Sienna was born on April 29, 2017.
‚ÄúDear Sienna Princess Wilson, No matter how big the wave, we will always be your calm in the storm. We Love You. Love, Mommy & Daddy,‚Äù Ciara wrote on Instagram.
They shared the first photos of Sienna months later.
Ciara told E! that since marriage and welcoming a new child, her home has ‚Äúbeen full of so much life and love.‚Äù
‚ÄúHe's been such an incredible father since day one,‚Äù she said of Wilson's parenting skills. ‚ÄúHe's so loving and very patient. He also likes to have fun‚Äîhe's very spontaneous and we just have a good time as a family... He inspires me, he's so driven and very ambitious, and he's always working hard whether he's on the field or off the field.‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúHe's always trying to make an impact in any way that he can. It's really inspiring to watch and to have a partner that has that kind of ambition. I'm also a very ambitious person, I'm very driven...it really just flows.‚Äù  
Two years after their wedding, the couple went on an official honeymoon in Botswana, Africa.
‚ÄúI could wake up like this every morning,‚Äù the singer wrote over a safari video.
Shortly after, the couple launched Why Not You productions to develop both scripted and unscripted TV and movie projects. 
‚ÄúWhile we work in different fields in our day-to-day, we are excited to come together to collaborate and create stories that we hope will touch people‚Äôs lives,‚Äù they said in a joint statement to The Hollywood Reporter. ‚ÄúWe are both storytellers at heart and we want to be able to share stories that uplift people and inspire others to create positive change. That‚Äôs ultimately what we want this company to represent.‚Äù 
While promoting her new album Beauty Marks on The View, Ciara shared more about her relationship. 
‚ÄúWhen you allow yourself to be vulnerable, you become your strongest,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúWhen I met the love of my life it was not only loving me, it was to love my son.‚Äù
Later that month, she told Access Hollywood, ‚ÄúYou know my husband‚Äôs pretty awesome and you know it‚Äôs been an incredible journey...Time goes by so fast and we‚Äôve been having the time of our lives. We call it organized chaos because obviously with him doing football and me doing music, the worlds are both moving fast and kinda like in two different directions, but sometimes parallel at the same time.‚Äù   
In January 2020, Ciara announced she and Wilson were expecting again. 
‚ÄúNumber 3,‚Äù she captioned a shot of herself in a bathing suit featuring a baby bump.
On July 23, their son Win Harrison was born. 
‚ÄúHappy Birthday WIN!!! Mommy & Daddy Love You!‚Äù Wilson wrote on Instagram.
Ciara also shared a video of herself with the new arrival.
Ciara honored her husband at the 2021 Met Gala by wearing his jersey number in Seahawks green on a gown by Dundas while wearing his Super Bowl ring from Super Bowl XLVIII and carriying a football clutch covered in crystals
The couple released a children's book together titled Why Not You?, encouraging kids to dream big. It is an extension of their shared Why Not You Foundation.
Ciara told People that young Future loves football, and Wilson has been helping him train.
‚ÄúHe's all about the details. He's all about the technique,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHe's firm with love though...He's all about coming back with love and so it's beautiful.‚Äù
Ciara brought Future and Sienna to watch Wilson play for the Denver Broncos in Las Vegas, Nevada.
At the end of a difficult season with the Broncos, Ciara wrote her husband a loving message of support on Instagram.
‚ÄúThis season has been a roller coaster ride like no other‚Ä¶ I've watched you endure so much and keep your head up high through it all! Your faith, belief, and confidence never wavered!‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúWhat I do know is a Winner is someone that gets back up when they're knocked down, someone who doesn't stop believing. Someone who embraces adversity and stays neutral through it all. Someone who can't be influenced by the words or opinions of others. Someone who loves loving others, serving others, and is always there for his family. All of that you are!‚Äù 
Ciara announced she was pregnant with her and Wilson's third child together and her fourth overall. She wrote on Instagram, ‚Äú‚ÄòYou look at me like that again, we make another kid‚Ä¶ You my heart I‚Äôm your rib‚Äô ‚Äù
A source told People that Ciara and Wilson were looking to keep expanding their family. ‚ÄúShe loves being a mother so this is what she loves doing,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúThis is what she has always wanted, and Russ too. They've always wanted a lot of kids.‚Äù
Ciara made an appearance on the Call Her Daddy podcast in October, and discussed her pregnancy and plans for the future with Wilson. First, she told host Alex Cooper about the early days of their courtship and keeping things private to start.
‚ÄúIt was the best thing for the both of us, we felt,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúBecause even though we were meeting as friends and all that stuff, my son was there and my dad was there.‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúWe were, like, talking and talking and talking and it was crazy. Everything that we talked about, like, we were aligned on...I knew that I'd never felt what I felt in that moment.‚Äù
Ciara also talked about Wilson as a dad.
‚ÄúHe's an amazing father,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúWatching him with all of our kids‚Äîit is one of the sweetest things. It's one of the sexiest things, to be honest with you. I'm just saying, ladies, when a man jumps in and changes the diaper, and he's pulling up to teacher-parent conferences, it's like, ‚ÄòOoh!‚Äô‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúThere's something about a man turning on that part of them, like, they're being a man for you but they're also being a man for your family. There's no better feeling than knowing that.‚Äù
Cooper joked about the pair planning baby number five, but Ciara quickly responded, ‚ÄúDon't get crazy now. Let's go one baby at a time.‚Äù

title: All About Taylor Lautner‚Äôs Wife Taylor Dome
text:
Twilight‚Äôs Taylor Lautner found his other half in another Taylor. Taylor Dome has officially changed her last name to ‚ÄúLautner‚Äù since their marriage, but to help with some confusion, she‚Äôll be referred here by her maiden name. It‚Äôs an issue they deal with themselves, as they‚Äôre happy to joke about. In fact, when Lautner appeared in a Taylor Swift music video, the three Taylors recreated the Spider-Man meme about finding your dopp√´lganger.
The Lautners are very open about their lives and marriage, and even have their own podcast together, The Squeeze. But here‚Äôs some info on Dome and how her and Lautner‚Äôs marriage came to be.
Dome is a registered nurse, completing her studies in 2019. She has also been working on her profile as an influencer, launching LEMONS by Tay in January 2022, a site dedicated to self-care and mental health. 
She was also once a huge Twilight fan. She shared a hilarious throwback photo of herself in November 2020 wearing a Twilight sweatshirt with the hashtag ‚Äú#tbt #twilightforever.‚Äù
In June 2022, she shared a video about who her childhood crush was, and it turns out Dome was once Team Edward.
And yet, she ended up with Jacob Black. Lautner commented on the post, ‚ÄúBout time I won something.‚Äù 
Dome is a good friend of Makena Moore, Lautner‚Äôs sister, and she introduced them.
‚ÄúMy sister Makena actually introduced us,‚Äù he said in an interview. ‚ÄúShe called me and said, ‚ÄòDude, I found your future wife. You need to meet this girl.‚Äô And the rest is history.‚Äù
While doing an interview on The Kelly Clarkson Show in 2022, he told Clarkson, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs just me and my sister so we‚Äôre super close, and she always said that she was gonna introduce me to my future wife, and I was like, ‚ÄòSure.‚Äô‚Äù
At the time of the intro, Lautner had taken a break from acting.
‚ÄúI wanted to take a step back and enjoy life and spend some time with my family and friends,‚Äù he told People. ‚ÄúAnd I met my fianc√©e out of it, so it all worked out.‚Äù
They connected during a game night, he explained. 
‚ÄúI love game nights. She‚Äôs [Moore] like, ‚ÄòThrow a game night, invite me and some of my friends over, and I‚Äôll bring Tay. She‚Äôll just be one of them, and you guys can just meet,‚Äô‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWe hit it off, and the rest is history.‚Äù
They shared that they were dating in 2018, and Lautner proposed in November 2021. They were married on November 11, 2022 in at Epoch Estate Wines outside of Paso Robles, California. Lautner wore a Dolce & Gabbana tuxedo, and Dome wore a Winnie Couture A-line gown.
Lautner described his proposal to Access Hollywood, saying, ‚ÄúShe always has said, ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt want anything special. I don‚Äôt want anything big and grand. Do it in the kitchen...I love cooking, so I make us food all the time in the kitchen and we just eat at the counter. And she‚Äôs like, ‚ÄòOne night after we eat in the kitchen, that‚Äôs all I want. Simple.‚Äô‚Äù
But he couldn‚Äôt stop himself from doing a little more.
‚ÄúI got tons of flowers and candles and a sign. So when she came home at the end of the day, after a long day of work, she walked into that,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt was a lovely surprise.‚Äù
He added, ‚ÄúIt actually did take her a little longer than expected to say ‚Äòyes‚Äô because she was weeping so hard. She couldn't even walk up to me. So I was on my mark and I have to leave the mark to go get her to lift her up from crying ‚Ä¶ It took a sec, but it was super sweet.‚Äù
For Dome‚Äôs 26th birthday, Lautner gave her a tattoo session. They got matching tattoos of their wedding date ‚Äú11.11.22‚Äù on their left wrists.
They made their first red carpet appearance together in April 2022, at the CMT Awards.
On The Kelly Clarkson Show, Lautner shared his wife‚Äôs plans to officially change her last name joking, ‚ÄúCause we already share one name, so it‚Äôs gonna be extra complicated,‚Äù adding, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm a narcissist.‚Äù 
On Wednesday, October 4, the two Taylors attended the Inaugural Rare Impact Fund Benefit which was hosted by Selena Gomez. They wore chic color coordinated outfits in black, with Lautner donning a two piece velvet ensemble with satin details and short sleeves and a pair of matching black shoes. His wife was in a strapless black gown with a thigh-high split up the skirt. She had a black-and-white blazer hung over her shoulders. On her feet were a pair of nude high-heeled sandals.

title: A Complete Timeline of Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds' Relationship
text:
One of Hollywood's most beloved couples, Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds, seem to have a perfectly-balanced relationship‚Äîparticularly when they take turns lovingly roasting each other on social media. The pair began dating in 2011 and were married about a year later. That might seem fast, but they'd been friends for a while and could simply no longer deny the chemistry between them.
More than a decade later, Lively and Reynolds remain happily married and share three daughters‚ÄîJames, Inez, and Betty‚Äîand their fourth baby, whose name and gender haven't been shared yet. 
Here, the complete history of Lively and Reynolds' love story.
Lively and Reynolds met through work. The two starred in the superhero movie Green Lantern but didn't date at the time. They both were actually in other relationships. Lively was dating her Gossip Girl co-star Penn Badgley, while Reynolds was married to Scarlett Johansson, a future on-screen superhero herself. They did appear together for the first time during Comic-Con in San Diego in 2010, preceding the film's release.
A few months later, Badgley and Lively split after three years together but supposedly remained friends. 
A source told Us Weekly, ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre professionals. They're still good friends and hang out on the set.‚Äù 
They did not publicize the news of their break up right away, however.
At the end of that same year, Reynolds and Johansson released a joint statement to People confirming they were separating, which read, ‚ÄúAfter long and careful consideration on both our parts, we‚Äôve decided to end our marriage. We entered our relationship with love, and it‚Äôs with love and kindness we leave it. While privacy isn‚Äôt expected, it‚Äôs certainly appreciated.‚Äù
Reynolds filed for divorce a few weeks later in December.
Lively and Reynolds walked the red carpet premiere of Green Lantern in Hollywood on June 15, 2011. There were still no rumors of a romance, and Lively was actually romantically linked to Leonardo DiCaprio. Lively and DiCaprio were first photographed together in Cannes, France that May, and then spent the summer together. But it was a brief fling, and E! reported they ended things when the season changed. 
But with fall came new love. People reported that Lively and Reynolds were dating shortly before Halloween, when she was seen exiting his apartment in Boston at the crack of dawn after his birthday weekend. A source told People at the time that the two are ‚Äúvery much a couple,‚Äù and ‚Äúthey‚Äôre really happy together.‚Äù
By Christmas time, Lively was already familiar with Reynolds' family, visiting his hometown of Vancouver in late December. Paparazzi caught a shot of them holding hands while walking in the streets between family time.
In the new year, PopSugar reported the pair went to New Orleans to Reynolds' private home for a romantic getaway.
The couple were back in Vancouver in the spring, PopSugar reported. They also ferried to Nanaimo, British Columbia, to meet with Reynolds' brother.
On September 9, 2012, Lively and Reynolds got married during a small secret ceremony with friends and family. The bride wore a couture gown designed by Marchesa, and Reynolds was in a classic Burberry suit. 
‚ÄúWhen Ryan first saw her, his face broke into a huge smile that crinkled his eyes,‚Äù a source told People. ‚ÄúThey just stared at each other with absolute love. Their faces were lit up with the candlelight, and it looked like something out of a romance movie.‚Äù
The couple have since apologized for holding their event at Boone Hall in Mount Pleasant, South Carolina. Boone Hall is a former plantation, and wedding on one is generally viewed as distasteful and offensive given the site's history.
Reynolds said in an August 2020 interview with Fast Company, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs something we‚Äôll always be deeply and unreservedly sorry for. It‚Äôs impossible to reconcile. What we saw at the time was a wedding venue on Pinterest. What we saw after was a place built upon devastating tragedy. Years ago, we got married again at home‚Äîbut shame works in weird ways. A giant f*cking mistake like that can either cause you to shut down or it can reframe things and move you into action. It doesn‚Äôt mean you won‚Äôt f*ck up again. But repatterning and challenging lifelong social conditioning is a job that doesn‚Äôt end.‚Äù
In 2019, the couple donated $2 million to the NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund and the Young Center for Immigrant Children‚Äôs Rights. 
Just after their marriage, Lively told Allure, ‚ÄúRight now, I'm so peaceful. I've never been happier in my life,‚Äù she said. It was also her first mention of a family since her marriage.
‚ÄúI've always wanted a big family,‚Äù she told outlet, answering a question about how many kids she wants with, ‚ÄúOh, I'd love 30 if I could.‚Äù 
The pair went to Paris for a little PDA, according to some Daily Mail photographs.
The pair appeared on the red carpet together for the first time since getting married, attending The Sound of Change Live concert at Twickenham Stadium in London.
For Lucky magazine‚Äôs September cover, Lively opened up about how marriage was influencing her personal style. Not at all!
‚ÄúI was recently asked how my style has changed since I got married, as if I was living under some sort of dictatorship,‚Äù she claimed. ‚ÄúI should hope I dress differently at 25 than I did when I graduated high school. I hope I never stop changing."
But she admitted that Reynolds does influence her in some ways. 
‚ÄúI'm very lucky to be with someone who has better taste than me. We influence each other in different ways. With film and TV, you don't see the results for months. Building a home, you get immediate gratification.‚Äù 
The couple attended the A Funny Thing Happened On the Way To Cure Parkinson's event benefiting The Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research in New York City. Reynolds lost his father to Parkinsons, so the event is close to his heart.
Lively and Reynolds attended their first Met Gala together on May 1, 2014, in New York City, wearing Gucci.
Lively told Vogue that summer that she and Reynolds live in one another's pockets.
‚ÄúEverything we do in life, we do together,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs going to be a great father and leader and patriarch‚Äîhe‚Äôs so meant to be all of those things.‚Äù 
She spoke about children again in the September issue of Marie Claire, saying, ‚ÄúHe's my best, best friend. What do you do with your best friend? You do nothing. If I could spit out a litter of kids, I would.‚Äù
On her lifestyle website Preserve, Lively announced she was expecting her first child with Reynolds, sharing a maternity photo.
Lively gave birth to her eldest daughter James in December 2014, though they did not initially share James' name or gender.
A source told Us Weekly in earlier January, ‚ÄúThe baby came early but everyone is happy and healthy.‚Äù
The big name reveal came from Reynolds during an interview on the Today Show. 
‚ÄúIt's James. Everyone knows. I didn't want to be the first guy screaming it out to the media,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúBecause as we know, little girls turn into teenage girls and little teenage girls sometimes scan through the archives and go, ‚ÄòWhy did you do that?‚Äô‚Äù
A couple months later, Reynolds shared a photo of baby James' hand. He captioned it, ‚ÄúThumb wrestling isn‚Äôt always fair. Curiously, my hand is the small one.‚Äù
The couple began to get more goofy on social media in the following years, and that Chirstmas, Reynolds shared a present from his wife on Instagram with the caption, ‚ÄúMrs @blakelively had this made by AdoraWools. Nothing says ‚ÄòI love you‚Äô like a felt #Deadpool, holding a chimichanga while riding a Unicorn dressed in ass-less leather chaps. Amaright fellas?‚Äù 
In February 2016, Reynolds' massive hit Deadpool premiered, and the couple walked the red carpet event together, their first major appearance since having a kid.
While at the amFar New York Gala a few days later, Reynolds Entertainment Weekly that his first date with Lively was actually a double date because they were just ‚Äúbuddies.‚Äù
He said, ‚ÄúAbout a year after Green Lantern had come and gone, and we were both single we went on a double date‚Äìshe was on a date with another guy, and I was on a date with another girl and it was like the most awkward date for the respective parties because we were just like fireworks coming across.‚Äù
Lively and Reynolds looked stunning State Dinner at the White House in Washington, D.C.
Moving towards Lively's joke goal of 30 children, Us Weekly reported the couple were expecting their second child in April 2016. Lively was filming The Shallows at the time, and photos from set show her small baby bump.
Lively told Marie Claire that she knew Reynolds ‚Äúwould always be my best friend for my whole life‚Äù in a July 2016 cover story.
She continued, ‚ÄúI'd never known anything like the friendship that I had with him. I could like him as much as I loved him.‚Äù
When asked what she was protective of, she replied,‚ÄúMy family: That's the thing that I feel most protective of and the thing that I feel is the most exposed when I feel exploited. Ryan had a nice, normal upbringing, and we want our kids to have the same normal life that we had. We don't ever want to rob them of what we had, because we'd feel really selfish.‚Äù
Their second child is born that September, as Page Six reported at the time. Once again, they keep their second daughter's name under wraps until Us Weekly revealed it to be Inez several months later.
During an interview for GQ‚Äôs December cover, Reynolds was asked when he knew Lively was the one.
‚ÄúProbably after the sex,‚Äù he joked. ‚ÄúNo, we were hanging out at this little restaurant in Tribeca that's open really late, and this song came on, and I was just like, ‚ÄòWant to dance?‚Äô No one was in there, so it was just totally empty. And it was just one of those moments where halfway through the dance, it was like, ‚ÄòOh, I think I just crossed a line.‚Äô And then I walked her home. And, uh, you know, I don't really need to go into what happened after that.‚Äù
When asked if he remembered what the special song was, he answered, ‚ÄúI do, but I'm not gonna say. You're shut out.‚Äù
The two girls made their red carpet debut with their parents when Reynolds was honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
Once again, Reynolds and Lively attended the Met Gala looking fabulous in New York City.
Lively and Reynolds are busy parents and busy actors, but they balance their hectic schedule.
‚ÄúMy husband and I don‚Äôt work at the same time, so we all go together as a family,‚Äù she told People. ‚ÄúIf we‚Äôre away as a family, it‚Äôs never more than for a day. We stay together.‚Äù And the kids go on set.
She added, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not in an office where I can‚Äôt do that, so she‚Äôs either with me or when I‚Äôm shooting a scene, she‚Äôs one room away. If she really needs me, I can pop over there.‚Äù
Reynolds celebrated Valentine‚Äôs Day by sharing a photo of a delicious cake he made, joking the icing was glue in the caption. It was for his wife, of course.
Now on year seven together, rumors surfaced that the couple might not be getting along too well, but Reynolds cleared things up by tweeting, ‚ÄúI wish. I could use a little ‚Äòme time.‚Äô‚Äù
I wish. I could use a little ‚Äúme time‚Äù. https://t.co/S6kXFsWaMe
While promoting Lively's new movie A Simple Favor, Reynolds teased his wife for answers to the film's mysteries on Twitter, and she answered, ‚ÄúOh darling, of all the secrets I‚Äôm keeping from you, this should be the LEAST of your concerns... trust me.‚Äù
Oh darling, of all the secrets I‚Äôm keeping from you, this should be the LEAST of your concerns... trust me.
For the red carpet premiere of Reynolds‚Äô project Detective Pikachu, the pair also premiered their new pregnancy. Lively wore a stunning yellow gown that showed off her figure and their expectation of a third child.
In October 2019, Lively and Reynolds welcomed their third child, a daughter named Betty, though her name wasn't revealed for quite a while‚Äîuntil it appeared on their friend Taylor Swift's album folklore.
Taylor Swift loves to drop Easter eggs in her projects, and her fans guessed that when they heard the names James and Inez, the third baby's name must be somewhere in the lyrics of folklore track ‚ÄúBetty.‚Äù Indeed, Betty is the title of the song about fictional characters named after all three of Reynolds and Lively's daughters at that point.
‚ÄúShe said ‚ÄòJames, get in, let's drive,‚Äô‚Äù Swift sings, and, ‚ÄúYou heard the rumors from Inez / You can't believe a word she says.‚Äù
Canadian-born Reynolds got his American citizenship shortly before the 2020 elections, and the couple voted early together. Lively shared a photo of herself with him, writing in the caption, ‚ÄúIt was Ryan‚Äôs first time. He was understandably scared. It all happened so fast. Like, REALLY fast. He wept. I pretended to weep. Then he called all his friends.‚Äù
Reynolds tells Access Hollywood that he loves ‚Äúbeing a girl dad.‚Äù 
‚ÄúI try to be as present as possible. I shoot movies, and my wife shoots movies, and we go travel all over the place, and we just all go together,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI think that that‚Äôs been the best part of it. We really don‚Äôt spend a lot of time apart. I get to spend a lot of time with my girls.‚Äù
He added, ‚ÄúI come from all boys. I have three older brothers. So for me to have three daughters has been such a ride, and I love every second of it.‚Äù
The couple shared on Instagram that they were getting their COVID-19 vaccinations.
Reynolds wished his wife a happy Mother‚Äôs Day with a photo of them cuddled up together, writing in the caption that Lively was the ‚Äúheart and soul of every moment their family shares.‚Äù
Reynolds shared more about how he made the first move on Lively while on SmartLess podcast. He recalled how when he and Lively met up in Boston, their friendship became something ‚Äúout of a fairy tale.‚Äù
‚ÄúI met Blake on the darkest crease in the anus of the universe called Green Lantern,‚Äù he joked. ‚ÄúWe were friends and buddies, and about a year and a half later, we went on a double date, but we were dating separate people.‚Äù
He and Lively had ‚Äúalways kind of kept in touch sort of casually.‚Äù 
‚ÄúNext thing you know, she was going to Boston, I was going to Boston and I said, ‚ÄòWell, I'll ride with you.‚Äô We got on the train and we rode together. I was just begging her to sleep with me,‚Äù he claimed. 
When asked what his big move was, he said, ‚ÄúI would use a little bit of tear stick so I could get the tears kind of rolling‚Ä¶then I would tell a little sob story about my life.‚Äù 
In August, the couple walked the red carpet together for the premiere of Reynolds' video game movie Free Guy, with Lively wearing Prabal Gurung dress and Lorraine Schwartz jewels.
Later that same month, Reynolds said in SiriusXM interview, per the Daily Mail, that thecouple trusted Taylor Swift ‚Äúimplicitly‚Äù with sharing youngest daughter's name.
‚ÄúWe thought it was pretty damn amazing. We still do,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI still walk down the street and shake my head thinking, ‚ÄòI can't believe that happened.‚Äô‚Äù 
He continued, ‚ÄúThe names are the names of our kids. We trust [Taylor] implicitly. She's very sensitive to any of that stuff.‚Äù
Reynolds also explained that the song ‚Äúhas nothing to do with our kids other than our kids' names.‚Äù  
The couple were ‚Äúsurprised,‚Äù and they had ‚Äúno idea‚Äù until they listened to the song the first time.
Reynolds shared more about how he and Lively keep their romance alive after a decade together in an interview with Entertainment Tonight. The secret ingredient is friendship.
‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt take each other too seriously, but we're also friends,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúFalling in love is great, but do you like each other? That's kinda the question you gotta ask yourself, you know, going into it. We've always liked each other. We grow together. We learn from each other. So yeah, I'm lucky to have a buddy in that.‚Äù
Speaking of friendships, the pair celebrated Taylor Swift's musical guest spot on Saturday Night Live that month. They were joined by Swift's ex Joe Jonas, his wife Sophie Turner, and Selena Gomez. The group attened the SNL afterparty at L'Avenue.
The next day, Swift dropped a teaser for new video for ‚ÄúI Bet You Think About Me (Taylor's Version) (From The Vault),‚Äù which was directed by Lively.
‚ÄúSURPRISE! NEW MUSIC VIDEO TOMORROW at 10am ET,‚Äù Swift announced on her Instagram. ‚ÄúI finally got to work with the brilliant, brave, & wickedly funny @blakelively on her directorial debut. Join us as we raise a toast, and a little hell.‚Äù
After a busy year, Reynolds said he'd be taking a break from acting to be more available to his family in an interview with LinkedIn News Senior Editor at Large Jessi Hempel.
‚ÄúI want my kids to have a pretty normal schedule,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúFor many years when my wife Blake would shoot a film, I would not shoot a film and I would be with the kids and vice versa. So we would sort of trade off. We never really worked at the same time. But always we were away. So the kids were away too.‚Äù
He continued, ‚ÄúNow that they're in school, they have a somewhat normal schedule. I think it's totally important for their development, and I really enjoy being a present dad. I love taking them to school in the morning; I love picking them up.‚Äù
The couple were seen out on a casual date in New York City on January 24, bundled up for a cozy day on the town.
Reynolds shared a picture of himself on the beach in matching blue pajamas, holding a white mug and smiling, which he credited to his wife on Instagram. It offered a little glimpse into their married life. 
After many years of being attendees, the couple were co-chairs of the Met Gala in 2022, where the theme of the night was ‚ÄúGilded Glamour.‚Äù Lively wore a crown and a custom Atelier Versace dress, and Reynolds wore a black tuxedo. 
A video of Reynolds‚Äô reacting to seeing Lively in her outfit for the first time went viral on @21MetGala‚Äôs Twitter, and it's pretty adorable.
To celebrate Lively's birthday on August 25, Reynolds posted a TikTok of him and Mariah Carey, writing, ‚ÄúMy favorite thing that's ever happened on August 25th.‚Äù 
The couple announced that they were expecting a fourth child when Lively stepped out for the Forbes Power Women's Summit, where she was being honored, and her pregnancy was very evident.
To get the paparazzi off her back, Lively shared her own pregnancy photos on Instagram as well.
‚ÄúHere are photos of me pregnant in real life so the 11 guys waiting outside my home for a ü¶Ñ sighting will leave me alone,‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúYou freak me and my kids out. Thanks to everyone else for all the love and respect and for continuing to unfollow accounts and publications who share photos of children. You have all the power against them. And thank you to the media who have a ‚ÄòNo Kids Policy‚Äô. You all make all the difference üôè‚ô•Ô∏è. Much love! Xxb.‚Äù
For the holiday, Reynolds released a new version of the classic tale A Christmas Carol with comedian Will Ferrell, a musical title Spirited. The actor shared one of his much-needed choreography lessons on Instagram, joking, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve got to be willing to be bad at something if you want to be‚Ä¶ slightly less bad at it? Here‚Äôs Will and I proving that point!‚Äù 
Reynolds might not have thought much of his moves, but Lively was all over it.
‚ÄúCan you get pregnant while pregnant??‚Äù she asked in the comments section.
Reynolds took the time during his People's Choice Award speech to gush about his family, after giving a thanks to his ‚Äúwork family.‚Äù
‚ÄúI‚Äôve got to thank my family family,‚Äù he said, via Buzzfeed. ‚ÄúBlake and my three daughters. It‚Äôs going to be a fourth child very soon. If it happens tonight, while I‚Äôm here, I will be looking for a couch to sleep on for a little while. I'd venture to guess that [People's Choice Award performer] Shania Twain has an amazing couch, I'm just saying.‚Äù 
‚ÄúBut Blake and my girls, you are quite literally my heart,‚Äù he continued. ‚ÄúYou are my hope, you are my happiness. I joke that my family exhaust me, but in reality, you give me more strength than any man could possibly deserve.‚Äù
In December, Reynolds also posted a photo of meeting Santa Claus and Mrs. Claus. 
‚ÄúWe met Jessica Claus and her husband on the Polar Express. She was everything I‚Äôd always dreamed since I was a kid. She smelled like cinnamon buns and sangria. üéÑ,‚Äù he captioned it. 
On January 2, Lively shared another pregnancy pic for her fans.
Her other big news for the month was that she'd been cast as red-headed Lily in the film adaptation of Colleen Hoover's mega hit It Ends With Us. After Deadline reported her casting, Lively posted an Instagram Story of herself with red hair, set to Smashing Pumpkin's song ‚ÄúLily (My One and Only).‚Äù 
Baby #4 arrived...although the child's name, gender, and birth date were kept private. Lively subtly revealed during Super Bowl Sunday that she had given birth to their newest addition when she shared a photo of herself visibly not pregnant.
Reynolds discussed how he and Lively were doing in mid-February, declining to share the child's gender during an interview with CNBC‚Äôs Power Lunch. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre very excited,‚Äù Reynolds said. ‚ÄúLook, we wouldn‚Äôt do this four times if we didn‚Äôt love it. Everybody‚Äôs doing great. Everybody‚Äôs actually doing fantastic. If we hadn‚Äôt figured it out by now, I think we‚Äôd be in deep, deep trouble.‚Äù
Presenting the 2022 CNBC Stock Draft Champions:@VancityReynolds and @weareMNTN's Mark Douglas They join to talk why they chose Netflix and Ford in the draft, recap the ads and marketing landscape after The Super Bowl, and other business ventures they're involved in pic.twitter.com/p9keg7Jwc5
Lively shared a look at her husband's summer physique‚Äîand made headlines for the ‚Äúextra spicy‚Äù commentary she added to the photo. It marked a rare moment of public flirting for the pair.
Reynolds marked Lively‚Äôs 36th birthday on August 25 with a very romantic tribute full of never-before-seen pics of the couple. ‚ÄúThe only thing irrevocably mine in the world is the love and appreciation and awe I feel for this person,‚Äù he wrote. ‚ÄúWitnessing her life is something I couldn‚Äôt take for granted if I tried. And believe me, I try. Happy Birthday, @blakelively. You hung the damn moon.‚Äù
On Sunday, October 1, the couple joined friend Taylor Swift in New Jersey for the New York Jets game. Swift's rumored love interested Travis Kelce was playing against the Jets with the Kansas City Chiefs, and she filled out the VIP box with other celebrities. In addition to Lively and Reynolds, she was joined by Hugh Jackman, Sophie Turner, Sabrina Carpenter, and Brittany Mahomes.

title: Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick's Complete Relationship Timeline
text:
Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick have one of the longest marriages in Hollywood, but they have managed to keep much of their private life private outside of a few strategic announcements. This is especially surprising considering how huge Parker got as the iconic Carrie Bradshaw on HBO's Sex and the City.
The couple seem to really understand one another, and that likely comes from the fact they understand their shared industry very well, too. They started dating in the early nineties, married in the late nineties, and went on to have three children together. 
Here's a timeline of the couple's 30-plus year relationship.
Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick met after being introduced to Parker by her brothers, Pippin and Toby, who founded the Naked Angels Theater Company. Both Parker and Broderick were already in the business, and the actor directed a play at the siblings' theater. They were then introduced.   
After five years of dating, the couple finally performed together side-by-side. Their debut was on Broadway in How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying. Parker told the Los Angeles Times, ‚ÄúHe's probably the funniest fellow I've met in my whole life...He's so bright, so handsome, I think he's the most handsome man I've seen in my life. And he inspires me. I'm mad for him, totally.‚Äù
She also shared how they got together the first time.
‚ÄúHe left a very charming, very self-effacing message on the machine,‚Äù Parker told the New York Times that same year. ‚ÄúYou know, ‚ÄòHi, it's Matthew Broderick.‚Äô You had to use your last name.‚Äù
On May 19, 1997, the couple tied the knot at New York City's Angel Orensanz Synagogue. They did not prep anyone for a wedding, inviting 100 friends to a party that then turned into a surprise ceremony. 
On October 28, 2002, the couple welcomed their first child, a baby boy named James Wilkie, after the actor's late grandfather, James Broderick. 
Broderick joins Parker at the premiere of the Sex and the City movie.
On June 22, 2009, they welcomed twin girls via surrogate, named Marion and Tabitha. In an interview with Vogue, Parker said the couple ‚Äútried and tried and tried to get pregnant‚Äù in the conventional way, but it did not work out. 
‚ÄúI would give birth as often as I could, if I could,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI cherished all the milestones, the good and the bad.‚Äù
After about twenty years together, Parker admitted that things between them weren't always smooth sailing in an interview with The Telegraph.
‚ÄúWe've been together for 20 years and you have good days, you have decent days, and you have bad days. That's a marriage,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúThat's a relationship. That's a friendship, even‚Äîrelationships outside the marriage run the same course.‚Äù
Parker added, ‚ÄúIf you're in it for the long haul, and you want meaningful relationships, you are going to go through lots of different periods.‚Äù
Because of her work as the star of the majorly popular Sex and the City, Parker is generally the one getting interviewed, and Broderick tends to keep a low profile. But while on the Meredith Vieira Show, he talked about why things have worked out for them long-term.
‚ÄúWe really are friends beyond everything else, and we talk a lot,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúKeep talking, I guess, I know how clich√© that is. Too much silence is definitely not a good idea.‚Äù 
For their 20th anniversary, Parker shared a sweet wedding photo on Instagram with the caption, ‚ÄúIt flew by Baby. Good golly I love you. XXX, Your wife.‚Äù
Parker appeared on an episode of Sophia Amoruso's podcast, Girlboss Radio,  and said she and Broderick often end up being apart for work.
‚ÄúI know this sounds nuts, but we have lives that allow us to be away and come back together,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHis work life takes him here, and mine takes me there. In some ways, I think that's been enormously beneficial because we have so much to share in a way.‚Äù
The couple finally returned to the stage together again for a Broadway show called Plaza Suite that made it to the pre-run before being shut down by the pandemic. In March 2020, they told WSJ. Magazine that there's a reason they waited so long to bring the band back together.
‚ÄúWe very rarely both work at the same time,‚Äù Broderick explained.
‚ÄúThis is the first time since we've had three children that we ‚Ä¶ are even prepared,‚Äù Parker added. ‚ÄúAnd it's hard. We have a son who's about to be away for spring semester. But I say all the time, there are families with parents serving in the military who are away all the time, you know? Just endless, impossible situations.‚Äù 
While on the SiriusXM show Quarantined with Bruce, Broderick shared another little ‚Äúsecret‚Äù to marriage: There is none.
‚ÄúI don't know the secret at all, but I'm very grateful, and I love her. It's amazing,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúYou know, speaking of how talented my wife is, I should also say that getting to do this play, even though we only just did it in Boston for a little while ... she was so, so good in it,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúAnd I had never acted with her onstage and had never really acted with her at all. And I was just reminded of how funny and smart and what a great comic actor she is‚Äîor actor, never mind the comic part.‚Äù
He added, ‚ÄúShe's very good at it. So I hope everybody gets to see her do it.‚Äù 
Parker is supported by her husband and son at the premiere of And Just Like That...
Parker appeared on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen  and shared that her first kiss with Broderick ‚Äúwas outside an apartment building,‚Äù and the second while heading to the subway station.
‚ÄúI had a Ricola in my mouth. It was the dead of winter and I thought‚Äîwell, it just seemed like a third party. So I spit it out into my gloved hand because I was getting on the subway ‚Ä¶ It was stuck on my glove,‚Äù she said.
And it did ruin the glove. 
Broderick took his turn on WWHL with Andy Cohen, and was asked when he knew he wanted to be with Parker forever.
‚ÄúOh, the first time I met her,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI saw her walking down the street and thought, ‚ÄòThat's it.‚Äô‚Äù 
For their 25th marriage anniversary on May 19, Parker shared an intimate pic with Broderick on Instagram.
The couple appeared together at the Hocus Pocus 2 premiere, in which Parker plays evil witch Sarah Sanderson, along with their daughters Tabitha Hodge and Marion Loretta Elwell.
On Saturday, May 20, Parker shared a photo of a champagne cork that came out of the celebratory bottle she shared with Broderick for their 26th anniversary. 
‚ÄúHappy 26th anniversary, my husband,‚Äù she wrote in the caption. ‚ÄúThat sure was a nice celebration and a real nice bottle of champagne. And a gorgeous walk home.‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúOh the miles we have strolled together. I love you. XOX, your SJ.‚Äù
On Thursday, October 5, Parker and Broderick walked the red carpet at the New York City Ballet Fall Fashion Gala. In a sweet moment captured by People, Parker stops to check and adjust her husband's bowtie. She was also wearing a long black bow accessory in her hair, which she briefly held up for a comparison to his before they both turned back to pose for photos arm-in-arm.
Parker was wearing a gown by Carolina Herrera with an off-the-shoulder neckline, peekaboo keyhole cutouts down the bodice, and a tulle skirt, along with different color heels in black and nude shades featuring rhinestone studded buckles. She also carried a small silver bucket purse and had a simple black watch on one wrist. Her husband wore a classic suit and glasses.
