title: A Complete Timeline of Cardi B and Offset‚Äôs Relationship
text:
Cardi B and Offset called it quits in 2020, TMZ reported at the time, but they reconciled before the end of the year and welcomed a new child in the fall of 2021. The couple's often tumultuous relationship has had its fair share of ups and downs prior to Cardi filing divorce papers in September 2020. 
They started 2018 secretly married, but then dealt with cheating rumors. In April of that year, Cardi confirmed they were expecting a baby and that they were married. By the end of 2018, Cardi announced they‚Äôd fallen out of love and would be breaking up. 
But the 2019 Grammys‚Äîincluding his onstage presence during her win‚Äîsignaled they were back together for the foreseeable future. After she filed the divorce papers, he was by her side for her birthday in Vegas. Then, they reconciled, and Cardi dismissed the divorce case two months after she filed. They have been together since.
Ahead, we relive the big moments in an exhaustive timeline of their entire coupledom.
Not much is known of the couple‚Äôs first meeting, but Cardi has said they first met at an ‚Äúindustry event‚Äù and Offset pursued her.
"He was very consistent," Cardi said in a video on her Twitter account, recapping the night they met. "He really wanted to talk to me.‚Äù
Cardi B on meeting Offset pic.twitter.com/ovHUmYPBBh
At this point, they were still ostensibly only collaborators and/or friends ‚Äî and they were also still far from household names.
Cardi was still best known as a reality star at this point; her first hit, ‚ÄúBodak Yellow,‚Äù wouldn‚Äôt come out for months. Migos‚Äô ‚ÄúBad and Boujee‚Äù was climbing the charts, after having been released in October 2016, so Offset‚Äôs star was on the rise.
Cardi B and Offset attended the 2017 Super Bowl together. Cardi posted on her Instagram Story about it, referring to Offset as ‚Äúmy friend‚Ä¶ you know what I‚Äôm saying?‚Äù
People sensed what was really up, though, and rumors started flying that the duo were dating. Offset confirmed to Rolling Stone in January 2018 that this had been the pair‚Äôs first real date. He called it a ‚Äúpower move,‚Äù but we‚Äôd say the real power move is putting a guy on your Instagram the first time he takes you out, while simultaneously referring to him as a friend.
The post has since been deleted, but it was a photo of them at the Super Bowl a few weeks earlier, according to Vibe. Offset commented with the boyfriend-girlfriend emoji, according to Bossip, so clearly they were well and truly hooking up by this point ‚Äî although it‚Äôd be a long time before they admitted it.
Cardi nabbed the cover of Fader magazine, but refused to confirm or define her relationship with Offset. She did talk about his work ethic, though.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been a blessing, me meeting him and meeting his friends. I see how hard they work. And that motivated me to work even harder,‚Äù she told Fader. ‚ÄúAnd I see how good things are going for them and how popping it is to be number one. And I‚Äôm like, I want that.‚Äù
While talking to Charlamagne Tha God, Cardi ‚Äî who still hadn‚Äôt confirmed she was even dating Offset ‚Äî said, "I'm a woman. Every woman, I think, wants to get married and wants to have children. It's never too early to get married now. You know, if you want to propose to me, you can.‚Äù
Not very subtle‚Äîbut it apparently worked.
While the rest of the world was obsessing over her new single ‚ÄúBodak Yellow,‚Äù Cardi was off getting married in secret, in Fulton County, Georgia. 
The general public didn‚Äôt learn the news until TMZ tracked down the couple‚Äôs wedding certificate in June 2018. At that point, they‚Äôd been married for eight months but still hadn‚Äôt announced it to the public.
Over the course of a few hours, Cardi posted a selfie with the word ‚Äúsingle,‚Äù then apparently took it back and confessed she was being ‚Äúextreme.‚Äù
‚ÄúSo listen babes ,I exaggerated alil bit earlier cause I was really upset and the Bronx girl in me always have to go to the extreme,‚Äù she wrote, over a photo of Offset. ‚ÄúI came to my senses now.Im sorry ...waffle house on me ?‚Äù
Cardi and Offset made headlines with this proposal‚Äîbut little did we all know, they were already married. Later, Cardi would reference the proposal in a statement about their wedding.
‚ÄúI appreciate and love my husband so much for still wanting for me have that special moment that every girl dreams of,‚Äù she tweeted the following June, ‚Äúwhen he got down on his knee and put a ring on my finger and he did that for me!!‚Äù
This why i name my album ‚ÄúInvasion of privacy‚Äù cause people will do the most to be nosey about your life .Welp fuck it . pic.twitter.com/U3uHFOT3qK
Offset was suspected of cheating on Cardi at the beginning of 2018. Rumors flew that he‚Äôd not only cheated on her, but made a sex tape with someone else. This wasn‚Äôt the first time rumors like these had popped up, and Cardi was already sick of hearing people‚Äôs opinions on her partner‚Äôs alleged infidelity.
"I'm going to make a decision in my own times with my heart and mind," she wrote on Twitter. "I don't need to be rushed or be told what to do. Its my life! I belong to me not to the world."
Cardi posted a video on Instagram and a fan, apropos of nothing, commented, ‚ÄúIs there maybe a Kylie Jenner secret that we need to know about lol Just asking,‚Äù referring to Kylie‚Äôs surprise-baby-heard-round-the-world.
Cardi swiftly responded, ‚ÄúNo bitch I‚Äôm just getting fat. Let me fat in peace.‚Äù
Dani C and Cardi B: "Let me fat in peace" pic.twitter.com/mO0hHsV9TY
Apparently one of Cardi B‚Äôs staff members let it slip at a Super Bowl party that she was pregnant, and TMZ got their hands on the info. Cardi responded to their publication of the rumor by posting an angry photo of Buttercup from ‚ÄúThe Powerpuff Girls‚Äù with the caption, ‚ÄúGetting on my damn nerves this morning.‚Äù
In her cover interview for Cosmopolitan, Cardi addressed all the drama that was swirling around the couple.
‚ÄúEverybody is coming down my neck like, ‚ÄòWhy are you not leaving him? You have low self-esteem.‚Äô I don‚Äôt have low self-esteem,‚Äù she told Cosmopolitan. ‚ÄúI know I look good. I know I‚Äôm rich, I know I‚Äôm talented. I know I could get any man I want‚Äîany basketball player, football player.‚Äù
Cardi said she wanted to work things out with Offset‚Äîand added that she‚Äôs ‚Äúno angel.‚Äù
‚ÄúI want to work out my shit with my man, and I don‚Äôt got to explain why,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not your property. This is my life ... I‚Äôm going to take my time, and I‚Äôm going to decide on my decision ‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs not right, what he fucking did‚Äîbut people don‚Äôt know what I did, ‚Äôcause I ain‚Äôt no angel.‚Äù
So much for fatting in peace. A beaming Cardi performed on Saturday Night Live in a tight white dress that showed off her pregnancy.
Offset posted on Instagram to thank fans for their support, but the post has since been deleted. The general public still believed the couple was engaged‚Äînot married‚Äîat this point.
Tricky tricky, Cardi and Offset. The couple managed to keep their nuptials secret all the way up until June 2018, when TMZ finally found their wedding certificate.
Cardi confirmed the news with a tweeted Notes App statement, as one does:
"There are so many moments that I share with the world and there are moments that I want to keep for myself! Getting married was one of those moments! Our relationship was so new breaking up and making up and we had a lot of growing to do but we was so in love we didn't want to lose each other."
This why i name my album ‚ÄúInvasion of privacy‚Äù cause people will do the most to be nosey about your life .Welp fuck it . pic.twitter.com/U3uHFOT3qK
The couple decided to get married on a whim one morning in September, she added:
‚ÄúWe found someone to marry us, and she did, just the two of us and my cousin. I said I do, with no dress, no makeup and no ring!‚Äù
She said in another tweet, ‚ÄúWell now since you lil nosey f*cks know at least ya can stop saying I had a baby out of wedlock.‚Äù
Cardi posted an insanely epic pregnancy glam-shot along with the baby‚Äôs name, Kulture Kiari Cephus, and birthdate: July 10, 2018. She tagged Offset.
There was trouble in paradise shortly after Kulture‚Äôs birth. Cardi was accused of throwing a bottle at two women in a strip club and ordering members of her entourage to attack them, according to TMZ.
One of the women was allegedly attacked on Aug. 15. Both claim Cardi‚Äôs posse attacked them on Aug. 29 when Migos were performing at the strip club where they worked as bartenders. Both the women and sources close to Cardi have said Cardi was not physically involved in the altercations. The women and TMZ allege that the attacks were ordered because Cardi thought Offset had cheated with one of the women.
It turns out Cardi and Offset got married in the most casual possible outfits: his-and-hers tracksuits. 
Cardi was charged with assault and reckless endangerment for the alleged attack, according to TMZ, which arose because Cardi believed one of the women had slept with Offset.
In an interview with W magazine, Cardi got real about how the ongoing cheating rumors make her feel.
‚ÄúEvery single day there‚Äôs rumors about me and my dude,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúAnd it almost drives me crazy, because I start to believe them. I don‚Äôt have no proof. I don‚Äôt have receipts. But I just got to know my man. We practically on the phone 24 hours a day. If I can‚Äôt find him, I‚Äôm going to find his friend. Somebody going to answer the phone. But I cannot be feeling insecure, to a point that I would drive my dude away, because these people want that to happen.‚Äù
Despite constant rumors about Offset‚Äôs infidelity and Cardi‚Äôs legal issues, the pair put on a united front at the AMAs.
Offset lured Cardi out with promises of a dinner date but surprised her with a massive surprise party, six dozen roses, a diamond-studded bracelet with their daughter‚Äôs name, and more.
Somewhat out of nowhere, Cardi announced early in December that she and Offset were breaking up.
‚ÄúSo everybody been bugging me and everything, and you know I‚Äôve been trying to work things out with my baby father for a hot minute now," she said in an Instagram video. "And we‚Äôre really good friends and you know, we‚Äôre really good business partners‚Äîyou know he‚Äôs always somebody that I went to to talk to, and we got a lot of love for each other but things just haven‚Äôt been working out between us for a long time.‚Äù
‚ÄúAnd it‚Äôs nobody fault," she added. "It‚Äôs just like, I guess we just grew out of love, but we‚Äôre not together anymore. I don‚Äôt know it might take time to get a divorce, and I‚Äôm going to always have a lot of love for him because he is my daughter‚Äôs father and yeah.‚Äù
The Instagram account @commentsbycelebs shared the video, and Offset commented, "y'all won.‚Äù
Meanwhile, the rumor mill was in overdrive. That same day, TMZ reported that Offset had been trying to arrange a sexcapade between himself and two women known as Cuban Doll and Summer Bunni, with no Cardi to be found. Yikes.
Some might say she was trying to steer the news away from their impending divorce. But Cardi finally shared a pic of Kulture the day after announcing her breakup from Offset.
FUCK YALL I MISS CARDI
Pretty self-explanatory.
Cardi took to Instagram Live to clear a few things up, and said there was no way her relationship with Offset was fake.
‚ÄúAin‚Äôt no type of publicity that I would ever want that would have my daughter looking at me crazy when she gets older,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúMy relationship was never fake. I met this n‚Äîa, he was on my ass, I gave him a chance and we fell in love with each other, things was not always gravy because at the end of the day we are two different people. But we never did anything for f*cking publicity, bitch. You think I got f*cking pregnant, could have ruined my career for f*cking publicity?"
In a video posted to his Instagram, Offset said he only had one birthday wish, and it‚Äôs to get his wife back.
‚ÄúI wanna apologize to you, Cardi,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI know I embarrassed you. I was partaking in activity I shouldn‚Äôt have been taking in.‚Äù
He called himself a ‚Äúselfish, messed-up husband‚Äù and said he apologized. Cardi didn‚Äôt respond, but fans were clearly sick of his apologies even before he posted the video.
‚ÄúAre y‚Äôall going thru a lot?‚Äù one Instagram commenter asked. ‚ÄúOr are you putting her thru a lot?‚Äù
‚ÄúDude! you will not stop cheating,‚Äù another said, ‚Äúyou will only get better at hiding it. It cannot be helped. You will do it again and disrespect her. Your apologies are hollow to her.‚Äù
Cardi headlined the Rolling Loud music festival on Dec. 16, and her set was interrupted when Offset walked onto the stage, with assistants wheeling out a series of signs that said ‚ÄúTake Me Back, Cardi.‚Äù
Cardi looked annoyed in videos of the encounter. After Offset left the stage, she finished her set. Later, she took to Instagram Live after the set to share her reaction with fans.
"I get that he's trying,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúIt's hard. It's gonna take a long time to‚ÄîI don't know what's going to happen next [...] I just feel bad. This is why I don't like surprises."
The plot thickened in the aftermath of the onstage ambush. Organizers of the Rolling Loud festival claimed that Cardi, or at least her people, knew Offset would be joining her onstage the whole time. And judging by their past sneaky onstage faux-proposal, fans might not put it past them to fake another dramatic onstage moment.
Many commentators and fans are agreeing that Offset‚Äôs antics‚Äîfrom the pleading Instagram video to the gesture onstage‚Äîare verging on harassment, or even emotional abuse. 
But Cardi has stuck up for her ex, urging people not to ‚Äúbash‚Äù him.
"I know I see a lot of people bashing me because I'm defending my baby's father, they think I'm gonna get back together with him,‚Äù she said on Instagram. ‚ÄúI'm not saying that I'm gonna get back together with him, I just don't like that bashing online thing.‚Äù 
Speculation began to swirl that this pair was officially on the road to reconciliation when TMZ acquired photos of the couple on a romantic jet ski ride in Puerto Rico. "I just had to get f*cked. That's all," Cardi said during an Instagram Live on the vacay, per E!.
Christmas came early for Cardi. The singer showed off a bunch of designer duds in a since-deleted Instagram, thanking Offset for the presents. According to E!, Offset bought Cardi a total of six designer purses (two Chanel and four Herm√®s Birkin bags), several extravagant-looking shoes, and multiple pieces of jewelry.  
A source gave an update to TMZ on the state of Cardi and Offset's once fractured marriage, hinting that a reconciliation is definitely on the table. Insiders told the outlet that the husband and wife had "been communication regularly" and are "focusing on fixing their marriage." While the piece noted that Cardi wasn't wearing her wedding ring, she was "receptive" to Offset after he vowed to "change his ways."   
TMZ broke the news once again that Cardi and Offset had formally called their divorce off and gotten back together. Multiple sources close to the couple told the outlet that Cardi had returned to the Atlanta home the husband and wife once shared together. "This is the first time she's been back to stay there with Offset and Kulture since December," the outlet noted. 
However, sources pointed out that Offset needed to change his phone number to ensure "he's serious about being honest and faithful," according to TMZ. "Our sources say the new digits are strictly for Cardi and business calls." 
Cardi B spoke about the news herself to People a few days later. "I hang out with him, I talk to him every day and we do our thing...It's just like to make things perfect...it takes time," she admitted.  "You know, f*cking and hanging out doesn‚Äôt mean that you guys are on like a perfect note, it takes time. It takes time. And it‚Äôs a marriage and there‚Äôs a child involved and family involved."
The couple's full-fledged declaration that they're together-together came at the Grammy Awards. Basically at every opportunity to showcase PDA, they did. On the red carpet, they aggressively French kissed. Cardi wore vintage Thierry Mugler, and Offset was in a black textured suit.
Then they sat together during the awards ceremony, where she was nominated for five awards, including Album of the Year. Cardi became the first solo female artist to win best rap album at the awards show for Invasion of Privacy.  
When she was announced as the winner, Cardi walked onstage with Offset by her side. "I want to thank my daughter," she said, referring to she and Offset's child, Kulture. "When I found out that I was pregnant, my album was not complete. I had like three songs. ... We was like, 'We have to get this album done so I can shoot these videos before I am showing.' It was very long nights." 
Then she turned her attention to Offset. "You, husband, thank you," she began. "Nah, serious, because he was like, 'You gonna do this album, girl. We gonna have this baby. We gonna make this album.'"
